  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>quite ready to begin, before he had announced
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to himself that he was about to fight, he threw
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the obedient, well-balanced rifle into position
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and fired a first, wild shot. Directly, he
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="5" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>stand near the colonel of the 304th. He shook his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fist in the latter's face. "<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_40_z009" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_40_z009" data-origname="del">x</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_40_z009" data-origname="add">Y</tei-add></tei-subst>ou've got t' hold 'em back,"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>he shouted savagely. "You've got t' hold 'em back."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>In his agitation, the colonel began to stam-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>mer. "A-all right, general, we-we'll d-do our b-best(.")
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The general made a passionate gesture and gal-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>loped away. The colonel, perchance as a woman
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>releaves her feelings with tears, began to swear
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>sweepingly. Fleming, turning swiftly to make sure
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>that the rear was unmolested, saw the cursing
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>cammander regarding his regiment in a very
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>resentful manner.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man at Fleming's elbow was mumbling
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>as if to himself: "Oh, we're in for it now. We're
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in for it now."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The captain of the campany had been pac-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing eXcitedly to and fro in the rear and had har-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>angued like a school-mistress: "Reserve your fire,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>boys--don't shoot 'til I tell you--save your fire
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wait 'til they git close up--don't be damned fools."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Perspiration streamed down Fleming's face which
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>was soiled like <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_40_z001" data-origname="del">a crying urchins</tei-del> that of a crying urchin.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He frequently with a nervous movement wiped his eyes
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with his coat sleeve.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He got a swift glance at the foe-swarming
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>field in front of him and, instantly, before he was
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>quite ready to begin, before he had announced
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to himself that he was about to fight, he threw
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the obedient, well-balanced rifle into position
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and fired a first, wild shot. Directly, he
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="5" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_42" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>42.<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Following this came a red rage. He developed the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>acute exasperation of a pestered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z001" data-origname="del">cow</tei-del> animal, a well-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>meaning animal cow worried by dogs. He had a furious feeling
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>against his weapon that could only kill one man at a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>time. He wished to rush forward and strangle with
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands. He craved a power that would enable
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>him to make a mad, world-sweeping gesture and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>brush all back. His impotency appeared to him
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and made his rage into that of a driven beast.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Buried in the smoke of many rifles,<tei-del rend="strikethrough pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z002" data-origname="del"> as in a</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z003" data-origname="del">sea</tei-del>, he his anger was not directed so much against
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the men whom he knew were rushing toward him
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>as against the swirling battle-phantoms who were
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>choking him, <tei-del rend="strikethrough pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z004" data-origname="del">with</tei-del> stuffing their smoke-robes down
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_42_z005" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z005" data-origname="del">his parched</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z005" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add></tei-subst> at his throat. He fought madly for respite, for
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>air, as a babe, being smothered, attacks the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>deadly blankets.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was a blare of heated <tei-del rend="strikethrough pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z006" data-origname="del">anger</tei-del>, rage,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>mingled with a certain expression of intentness,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on all faces. Nearly every man was making a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>noise with his mouth. The cheers, snarls, im-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>precations, wailings, made a wild, barbaric song.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man at Fleming's elbow was babbling like an
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>infant. Jim Conklin was swearing in a loud voice.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>From his lips came a black procession of curious
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>oaths. Suddenly, another broke out in a querelous
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>way like a man who has mislaid his hat: "Well,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>then, why don't they support us? Why don't they
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>send supports? Do they think--"
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="5" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_42" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>42.<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Following this came a red rage. He developed the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>acute exasperation of a pestered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z001" data-origname="del">cow</tei-del> animal, a well-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>meaning animal cow worried by dogs. He had a furious feeling
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>against his weapon that could only kill one man at a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>time. He wished to rush forward and strangle with
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands. He craved a power that would enable
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>him to make a mad, world-sweeping gesture and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>brush all back. His impotency appeared to him
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and made his rage into that of a driven beast.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Buried in the smoke of many rifles,<tei-del rend="strikethrough pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z002" data-origname="del"> as in a</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z003" data-origname="del">sea</tei-del>, he his anger was not directed so much against
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the men whom he knew were rushing toward him
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>as against the swirling battle-phantoms who were
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>choking him, <tei-del rend="strikethrough pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z004" data-origname="del">with</tei-del> stuffing their smoke-robes down
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_42_z005" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z005" data-origname="del">his parched</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z005" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add></tei-subst> at his throat. He fought madly for respite, for
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>air, as a babe, being smothered, attacks the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>deadly blankets.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was a blare of heated <tei-del rend="strikethrough pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z006" data-origname="del">anger</tei-del>, rage,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>mingled with a certain expression of intentness,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on all faces. Nearly every man was making a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>noise with his mouth. The cheers, snarls, im-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>precations, wailings, made a wild, barbaric song.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man at Fleming's elbow was babbling like an
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>infant. Jim Conklin was swearing in a loud voice.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>From his lips came a black procession of curious
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>oaths. Suddenly, another broke out in a querelous
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>way like a man who has mislaid his hat: "Well,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>then, why don't they support us? Why don't they
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>send supports? Do they think--"
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="5" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_42" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>42.<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Following this came a red rage.   <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z003" data-origname="del">sea</tei-del>, he his anger was not directed so much against

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>choking him, <tei-del rend="strikethrough pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z004" data-origname="del">with</tei-del> stuffing their smoke-robes down
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_42_z005" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z005" data-origname="del">his parched</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z005" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add></tei-subst> at his throat. He fought madly for respite, for
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>air, as a babe, being smothered, attacks the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>deadly blankets.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was a blare of heated <tei-del rend="strikethrough pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_42_z006" data-origname="del">anger</tei-del>, rage,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>mingled with a certain expression of intentness,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on all faces. Nearly every man was making a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>noise with his mouth. The cheers, snarls, im-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>precations, wailings, made a wild, barbaric song.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man at Fleming's elbow was babbling like an
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>infant. Jim Conklin was swearing in a loud voice.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>From his lips came a black procession of curious
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>oaths. Suddenly, another broke out in a querelous
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>way like a man who has mislaid his hat: "Well,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>then, why don't they support us? Why don't they
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>send supports? Do they think--"
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="5" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_45" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z005" data-origname="del" data-empty=""></tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z007" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z006" data-origname="del" data-empty=""></tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z008" data-origname="del" data-empty=""></tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z010" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z011" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add><tei-metamark place="margin-bottom" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z009" data-origname="metamark" data-empty=""></tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z012" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add><tei-ab data-origname="ab">45<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>45<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>A small procession of wounded men was going
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>drearily toward the rear. It was like a flow of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>blood from the torn body of the regiment.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>To the right and left were the dark lines of other
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>troops. Far in front, he could see lighter masses protrud-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing in points from the one woods. They were vaguely suggestive
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of untold thousands.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Once he saw a tiny battery go dashing along the line
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of the horizon. The tiny riders were beating the tiny horses.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>From a sloping hill came the sound of cheering and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>clashes. Smokes welled steadily up. Batteries were speaking
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with thunderous oratorical effort. Here and there, were flags,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the red in the stripes dominating. They splashed bits of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>brilliant color upon the dark troops.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming felt the old thrill at the sight of the emblems.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>They were like beautiful birds strangely undaunted in a storm.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>As he listened to the din from the hill-side hill side, and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to a deep pulsating thunder that came from afar to the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>right and to the lesser clamors which came from
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>many directions, it occurred to Fleming that they were
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fighting too, over there and over there and over there.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Heretofore he had supposed that the battle was directly
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>under his nose.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>As he gazed around him, Fleming felt a flash of as-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tonishment at the blue, pure sky and the sun-gleam-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ings on the trees and fields. It was surprising
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>that nature had gone tranquilly with her
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>golden processes in the midst of so much devil-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ment.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_45" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z005" data-origname="del" data-empty=""></tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z007" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z006" data-origname="del" data-empty=""></tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z008" data-origname="del" data-empty=""></tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z010" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z011" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add><tei-metamark place="margin-bottom" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z009" data-origname="metamark" data-empty=""></tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z012" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add><tei-ab data-origname="ab">45<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>45<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>A small procession of wounded men was going

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of untold thousands.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Once he saw a tiny battery go dashing along the line

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>From a sloping hill came the sound of cheering and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>clashes. Smokes welled steadily up. Batteries were speaking
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with thunderous oratorical effort. Here and there, were flags,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the red in the stripes dominating. They splashed bits of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>brilliant color upon the dark troops.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming felt the old thrill at the sight of the emblems.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>They were like beautiful birds strangely undaunted in a storm.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>As he listened to the din from the hill-side hill side, and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to a deep pulsating thunder that came from afar to the

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Heretofore he had supposed that the battle was directly
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>under his nose.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>As he gazed around him, Fleming felt a flash of as-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tonishment at the blue, pure sky and the sun-gleam-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ings on the trees and fields. It was surprising
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>that nature had gone tranquilly with her
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>golden processes in the midst of so much devil-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ment.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>under his nose.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>As he gazed around him, Fleming felt a flash of as-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tonishment at the blue, pure sky and the sun-gleam-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ings on the trees and fields. It was surprising
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>that nature had gone tranquilly with her
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>golden processes in the midst of so much devil-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ment.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_45" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z005" data-origname="del" data-empty=""></tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z007" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z006" data-origname="del" data-empty=""></tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z008" data-origname="del" data-empty=""></tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z010" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z011" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add><tei-metamark place="margin-bottom" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z009" data-origname="metamark" data-empty=""></tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_45_z012" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add><tei-ab data-origname="ab">45<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>45<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>A small procession of wounded men was going
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>drearily toward the rear. It was like a flow of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>blood from the torn body of the regiment.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>To the right and left were the dark lines of other
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>troops. Far in front, he could see lighter masses protrud-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing in points from the one woods. They were vaguely suggestive
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of untold thousands.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Once he saw a tiny battery go dashing along the line
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of the horizon. The tiny riders were beating the tiny horses.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>From a sloping hill came the sound of cheering and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>clashes. Smokes welled steadily up. Batteries were speaking
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with thunderous oratorical effort. Here and there, were flags,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the red in the stripes dominating. They splashed bits of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>brilliant color upon the dark troops.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming felt the old thrill at the sight of the emblems.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>They were like beautiful birds strangely undaunted in a storm.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>As he listened to the din from the hill-side hill side, and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to a deep pulsating thunder that came from afar to the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>right and to the lesser clamors which came from
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>many directions, it occurred to Fleming that they were
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fighting too, over there and over there and over there.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Heretofore he had supposed that the battle was directly
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>under his nose.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>As he gazed around him, Fleming felt a flash of as-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tonishment at the blue, pure sky and the sun-gleam-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ings on the trees and fields. It was surprising
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>that nature had gone tranquilly with her
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>golden processes in the midst of so much devil-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ment.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with thunderous oratorical effort. Here and there, were flags,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the red in the stripes dominating. They splashed bits of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>brilliant color upon the dark troops.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming felt the old thrill at the sight of the emblems.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>They were like beautiful birds strangely undaunted in a storm.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>As he listened to the din from the hill-side hill side, and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to a deep pulsating thunder that came from afar to the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>right and to the lesser clamors which came from
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>many directions, it occurred to Fleming that they were
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fighting too, over there and over there and over there.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Heretofore he had supposed that the battle was directly
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>under his nose.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>As he gazed around him, Fleming felt a flash of as-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tonishment at the blue, pure sky and the sun-gleam-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ings on the trees and fields. It was surprising
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>that nature had gone tranquilly with her
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>golden processes in the midst of so much devil-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ment.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_46" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="above" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_46_z012" data-origname="metamark">46</tei-metamark><tei-metamark place="above" function="" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_46_z013" data-origname="metamark">VI.</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming awakened slowly. He came gradually back to a 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>position from which he could regard himself. For moments, 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>he had been scrutinizing <tei-del rend="overwrite ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_46_z008" data-origname="del">he</tei-del>his person in a dazed way as if he 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>had never seen himself before. Then he picked up his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>cap from the ground. He wriggled in his jacket to make 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a more comfortable fit and kneeling down laced his shoe. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He thoughtfully moped his reeking features.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>So it was all over. He went into an ecstasy of self-satis-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>faction. He had the most delightful sensations of his life. Stand-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing as if apart from himself, he viewed the late scene<tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_46_z001" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>percieved that the man who had fought thus was magnificent.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He felt that he was a fine fellow. He saw him-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>self even with those ideals which he had considered 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>as being far beyond him. He smiled with deep grati-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fication. <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_46_z003" data-origname="del">on his fellows</tei-del> He beamed good-will and ten-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>derness on his fellows.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Gee, aint it hot, eh?" he said affably to a 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>man who was polishing his <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_46_z005" data-origname="del">face</tei-del><tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_46_z006" data-origname="del" data-empty=""></tei-del> streaming face with 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his coat-sleeve. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"You bet," said the other grinning sociably. "I 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>never seen sech dumb hotness." He <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_46_z007" data-origname="del">sp</tei-del> sprawled 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>out luxuriously on the ground. "I hope we 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>don't have no more fightin' til -- 'til a week
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from Monday."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There were some hand-shakings and deep speeches 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with men whose features only were familar but with 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>whom Fleming now felt the bonds of tied hearts. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>helped a cursing comrade to bind up a wound 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of the shin.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There were some hand-shakings and deep speeches 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with men whose features only were familar but with

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_46" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="above" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_46_z012" data-origname="metamark">46</tei-metamark><tei-metamark place="above" function="" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_46_z013" data-origname="metamark">VI.</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming awakened slowly.   <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>position from which he could regard himself. For moments, 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>he had been scrutinizing <tei-del rend="overwrite ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_46_z008" data-origname="del">he</tei-del>his person in a dazed way as if he 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>had never seen himself before. Then he picked up his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>cap from the ground. He wriggled in his jacket to make 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a more comfortable fit and kneeling down laced his shoe. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He thoughtfully moped his reeking features.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>So it was all over. He went into an ecstasy of self-satis-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>faction. He had the most delightful sensations of his life. Stand-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing as if apart from himself, he viewed the late scene<tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_46_z001" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>percieved that the man who had fought thus was magnificent.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He felt that he was a fine fellow. He saw him-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>self even with those ideals which he had considered 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>as being far beyond him. He smiled with deep grati-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fication. <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_46_z003" data-origname="del">on his fellows</tei-del> He beamed good-will and ten-

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Gee, aint it hot, eh?" he said affably to a

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from Monday."

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>had never seen himself before. Then he picked up his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>cap from the ground. He wriggled in his jacket to make 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a more comfortable fit and kneeling down laced his shoe. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He thoughtfully moped his reeking features.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>So it was all over. He went into an ecstasy of self-satis-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>faction. He had the most delightful sensations of his life. Stand-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing as if apart from himself, he viewed the late scene<tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_46_z001" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>percieved that the man who had fought thus was magnificent.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He felt that he was a fine fellow. He saw him-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>self even with those ideals which he had considered 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>as being far beyond him. He smiled with deep grati-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fication. <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_46_z003" data-origname="del">on his fellows</tei-del> He beamed good-will and ten-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>derness on his fellows.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Gee, aint it hot, eh?" he said affably to a 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>man who was polishing his <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_46_z005" data-origname="del">face</tei-del><tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_46_z006" data-origname="del" data-empty=""></tei-del> streaming face with 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his coat-sleeve. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"You bet," said the other grinning sociably. "I 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>never seen sech dumb hotness." He <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_46_z007" data-origname="del">sp</tei-del> sprawled 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>out luxuriously on the ground. "I hope we 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>don't have no more fightin' til -- 'til a week
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from Monday."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There were some hand-shakings and deep speeches 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with men whose features only were familar but with 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>whom Fleming now felt the bonds of tied hearts. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>helped a cursing comrade to bind up a wound 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of the shin.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_47" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="above" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z015" data-origname="metamark">47</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z002" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z011" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Of a sudden, cries of amazement broke out along the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks of the new regiment. "Here they come ag'in! Here 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>they come a'gin!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned quick eyes on the field. He saw 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>forms begin to swell in masses out of a distant <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z001" data-origname="add">wood</tei-add>. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>again saw <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z004" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z003" data-origname="add">the</tei-add> tilted flag<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z005" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>, speeding forward.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Too, shells exploded in the grass and among the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>foliage. They were strange war-blossoms bursting 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>into fierce bloom.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The men groaned. The slaves toiling in the tem-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ple <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z016" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z007" data-origname="add">of war</tei-add> felt a sudden rebellion. The lustre had faded 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from the<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z009" data-origname="add">ir</tei-add> eyes<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z017" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z008" data-origname="del">of the men.</tei-del> Their smudged countenances 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>expressed a profound dejection. They moved their stiff-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ened bodies slowly and watched in sullen mood the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>frantic approach of the enemy.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Some began to fret and complain. "Oh, say, this 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>is too much of a good thing. Why can't som<tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z012" data-origname="add">e</tei-add>body send <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z010" data-origname="add">us</tei-add> supports?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"We aint never goin' t' stand this second bangin'.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I didn't come here t' fight th' hull damn rebel army."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was one who raised a doleful cry. "I 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_47" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="above" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z015" data-origname="metamark">47</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z002" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z011" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Of a sudden, cries of amazement broke out along the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks of the new regiment. "Here they come ag'in! Here 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>they come a'gin!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned quick eyes on the field. He saw 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>forms begin to swell in masses out of a distant <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z001" data-origname="add">wood</tei-add>. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>again saw <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z004" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z003" data-origname="add">the</tei-add> tilted flag<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z005" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>, speeding forward.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Too, shells exploded in the grass and among the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>foliage. They were strange war-blossoms bursting 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>into fierce bloom.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The men groaned. The slaves toiling in the tem-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ple <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z016" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z007" data-origname="add">of war</tei-add> felt a sudden rebellion. The lustre had faded 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from the<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z009" data-origname="add">ir</tei-add> eyes<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z017" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z008" data-origname="del">of the men.</tei-del> Their smudged countenances 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>expressed a profound dejection. They moved their stiff-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ened bodies slowly and watched in sullen mood the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>frantic approach of the enemy.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Some began to fret and complain. "Oh, say, this 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>is too much of a good thing. Why can't som<tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z012" data-origname="add">e</tei-add>body send <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z010" data-origname="add">us</tei-add> supports?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"We aint never goin' t' stand this second bangin'.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I didn't come here t' fight th' hull damn rebel army."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was one who raised a doleful cry. "I 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_47" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="above" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z015" data-origname="metamark">47</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z002" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z011" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Of a sudden, cries of amazement broke out along the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks of the new regiment. "Here they come ag'in! Here 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>they come a'gin!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned quick eyes on the field. He saw 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>forms begin to swell in masses out of a distant <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z001" data-origname="add">wood</tei-add>. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>again saw <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z004" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z003" data-origname="add">the</tei-add> tilted flag<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z005" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>, speeding forward.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Too, shells exploded in the grass and among the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>foliage. They were strange war-blossoms bursting 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>into fierce bloom.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The men groaned. The slaves toiling in the tem-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ple <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z016" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z007" data-origname="add">of war</tei-add> felt a sudden rebellion. The lustre had faded 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from the<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z009" data-origname="add">ir</tei-add> eyes<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z017" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z008" data-origname="del">of the men.</tei-del> Their smudged countenances 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>expressed a profound dejection. They moved their stiff-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ened bodies slowly and watched in sullen mood the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>frantic approach of the enemy.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Some began to fret and complain. "Oh, say, this 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>is too much of a good thing. Why can't som<tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z012" data-origname="add">e</tei-add>body send <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z010" data-origname="add">us</tei-add> supports?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"We aint never goin' t' stand this second bangin'.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I didn't come here t' fight th' hull damn rebel army."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was one who raised a doleful cry. "I 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_47" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="above" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z015" data-origname="metamark">47</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z002" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z011" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Of a sudden, cries of amazement broke out along the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks of the new regiment. "Here they come ag'in! Here 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>they come a'gin!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned quick eyes on the field. He saw 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>forms begin to swell in masses out of a distant <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z001" data-origname="add">wood</tei-add>. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>again saw <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z004" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z003" data-origname="add">the</tei-add> tilted flag<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z005" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>, speeding forward.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Too, shells exploded in the grass and among the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>foliage. They were strange war-blossoms bursting 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>into fierce bloom.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The men groaned. The slaves toiling in the tem-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ple <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z016" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z007" data-origname="add">of war</tei-add> felt a sudden rebellion. The lustre had faded 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from the<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z009" data-origname="add">ir</tei-add> eyes<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z017" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z008" data-origname="del">of the men.</tei-del> Their smudged countenances 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>expressed a profound dejection. They moved their stiff-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ened bodies slowly and watched in sullen mood the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>frantic approach of the enemy.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Some began to fret and complain. "Oh, say, this 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>is too much of a good thing. Why can't som<tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z012" data-origname="add">e</tei-add>body send <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z010" data-origname="add">us</tei-add> supports?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"We aint never goin' t' stand this second bangin'.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I didn't come here t' fight th' hull damn rebel army."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was one who raised a doleful cry. "I 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>
