  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_47" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="above" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z015" data-origname="metamark">47</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z002" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z011" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Of a sudden, cries of amazement broke out along the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks of the new regiment. "Here they come ag'in! Here 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>they come a'gin!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned quick eyes on the field. He saw 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>forms begin to swell in masses out of a distant <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z001" data-origname="add">wood</tei-add>. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>again saw <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z004" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z003" data-origname="add">the</tei-add> tilted flag<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z005" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>, speeding forward.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Too, shells exploded in the grass and among the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>foliage. They were strange war-blossoms bursting 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>into fierce bloom.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The men groaned. The slaves toiling in the tem-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ple <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z016" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z007" data-origname="add">of war</tei-add> felt a sudden rebellion. The lustre had faded 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from the<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z009" data-origname="add">ir</tei-add> eyes<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z017" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z008" data-origname="del">of the men.</tei-del> Their smudged countenances 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>expressed a profound dejection. They moved their stiff-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ened bodies slowly and watched in sullen mood the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>frantic approach of the enemy.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Some began to fret and complain. "Oh, say, this 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>is too much of a good thing. Why can't som<tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z012" data-origname="add">e</tei-add>body send <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z010" data-origname="add">us</tei-add> supports?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"We aint never goin' t' stand this second bangin'.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I didn't come here t' fight th' hull damn rebel army."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was one who raised a doleful cry. "I 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_47" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="above" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z015" data-origname="metamark">47</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z002" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z011" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Of a sudden, cries of amazement broke out along the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks of the new regiment. "Here they come ag'in! Here 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>they come a'gin!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned quick eyes on the field. He saw 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>forms begin to swell in masses out of a distant <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z001" data-origname="add">wood</tei-add>. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>again saw <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z004" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z003" data-origname="add">the</tei-add> tilted flag<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z005" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>, speeding forward.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Too, shells exploded in the grass and among the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>foliage. They were strange war-blossoms bursting 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>into fierce bloom.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The men groaned. The slaves toiling in the tem-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ple <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z016" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z007" data-origname="add">of war</tei-add> felt a sudden rebellion. The lustre had faded 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from the<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z009" data-origname="add">ir</tei-add> eyes<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z017" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z008" data-origname="del">of the men.</tei-del> Their smudged countenances 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>expressed a profound dejection. They moved their stiff-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ened bodies slowly and watched in sullen mood the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>frantic approach of the enemy.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Some began to fret and complain. "Oh, say, this 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>is too much of a good thing. Why can't som<tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z012" data-origname="add">e</tei-add>body send <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z010" data-origname="add">us</tei-add> supports?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"We aint never goin' t' stand this second bangin'.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I didn't come here t' fight th' hull damn rebel army."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was one who raised a doleful cry. "I 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_47" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="above" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z015" data-origname="metamark">47</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z002" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z011" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Of a sudden, cries of amazement broke out along the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks of the new regiment. "Here they come ag'in! Here 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>they come a'gin!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned quick eyes on the field. He saw 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>forms begin to swell in masses out of a distant <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z001" data-origname="add">wood</tei-add>. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>again saw <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z004" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z003" data-origname="add">the</tei-add> tilted flag<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z005" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>, speeding forward.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Too, shells exploded in the grass and among the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>foliage. They were strange war-blossoms bursting 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>into fierce bloom.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The men groaned. The slaves toiling in the tem-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ple <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z016" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z007" data-origname="add">of war</tei-add> felt a sudden rebellion. The lustre had faded 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from the<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z009" data-origname="add">ir</tei-add> eyes<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z017" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z008" data-origname="del">of the men.</tei-del> Their smudged countenances 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>expressed a profound dejection. They moved their stiff-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ened bodies slowly and watched in sullen mood the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>frantic approach of the enemy.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Some began to fret and complain. "Oh, say, this 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>is too much of a good thing. Why can't som<tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z012" data-origname="add">e</tei-add>body send <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z010" data-origname="add">us</tei-add> supports?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"We aint never goin' t' stand this second bangin'.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I didn't come here t' fight th' hull damn rebel army."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was one who raised a doleful cry. "I 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_47" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="above" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z015" data-origname="metamark">47</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z002" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z011" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Of a sudden, cries of amazement broke out along the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks of the new regiment. "Here they come ag'in! Here 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>they come a'gin!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned quick eyes on the field. He saw 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>forms begin to swell in masses out of a distant <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z001" data-origname="add">wood</tei-add>. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>again saw <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z004" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z003" data-origname="add">the</tei-add> tilted flag<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z005" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>, speeding forward.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Too, shells exploded in the grass and among the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>foliage. They were strange war-blossoms bursting 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>into fierce bloom.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The men groaned. The slaves toiling in the tem-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ple <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z016" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z007" data-origname="add">of war</tei-add> felt a sudden rebellion. The lustre had faded 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from the<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z009" data-origname="add">ir</tei-add> eyes<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z017" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z008" data-origname="del">of the men.</tei-del> Their smudged countenances 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>expressed a profound dejection. They moved their stiff-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ened bodies slowly and watched in sullen mood the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>frantic approach of the enemy.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Some began to fret and complain. "Oh, say, this 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>is too much of a good thing. Why can't som<tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z012" data-origname="add">e</tei-add>body send <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z010" data-origname="add">us</tei-add> supports?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"We aint never goin' t' stand this second bangin'.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I didn't come here t' fight th' hull damn rebel army."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was one who raised a doleful cry. "I 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>wish Bill Smither<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z018" data-origname="del">'</tei-del>s had trod on my hand instead<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z019" data-origname="add">er</tei-add></tei-subst> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>me treddin' on his'n."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming waited gingerly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z020" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="del">i</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z021" data-origname="add">I</tei-add></tei-subst>t was as if he expected 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a cold plunge.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The firing began somewhere and ripped along
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the line in both directions. The level sheets of flame 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="del">made</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_47_z022" data-origname="add">developed</tei-add></tei-subst> great clouds of smoke that tumbled and 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tossed near the ground for a moment and then 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rolled away toward the rear going through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ranks as through a grate. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_47_z024" data-origname="del">The fla</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The flag was often eaten and lost
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_48" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="above" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z001" data-origname="metamark">48</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z002" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in the great clouds <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z003" data-origname="add">that were</tei-add> tinged with an earthlike yel-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>low in the sun-rays, and changed to a sor-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ry blue in the shadows.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming's eyes had a look in them that one can 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>see in the orbs of a jaded horse. The muscles of his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arms <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_48_z005" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z005" data-origname="del">left</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z005" data-origname="add">felt</tei-add></tei-subst> numb and bloodless. His hands, too, seemed 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>large and awkward as if he were wearing invisible 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>mittens. And there was a great uncertainty about his knee-joints.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The words that comrades had uttered previous to 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the firing began to appear to him. "Oh, say, this is too 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>much of a good thing." "What do they take us fer--why 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>don't they send us supports." "I didn't come here t' fight 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>th' hull damn rebel army."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He began to exaggerate the endurance, the skill 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and the valor of those who were coming. They must be
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>steel machines. Himself, reeling from nervous exhaustion, 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>he could not understand such persistency.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He mechanically lifted his rifle and, catching 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a glimpse of <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_48_z009" data-origname="del">a cantering cluster</tei-del> the thick-spread field,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>he fired a shot at a cantering<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z008" data-origname="del">ly</tei-del> cluster. He stopped 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>then and began to gaze as best he could through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>smoke. He caught changing views of the ground 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>covered with men who were all running and yell-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing like pursued imps.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>To him, it was an onslaught of dragons. He be
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>came like the m<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_48_z006" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_48_z006" data-origname="del">e</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_48_z006" data-origname="add">a</tei-add></tei-subst>n who lost his legs at the ap-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>proach of the red and green monster. He waited
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in a sort of a horrified, listening attitude. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>seemed to shut his eyes and wait to be gobbled.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_48" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="above" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z001" data-origname="metamark">48</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z002" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in the great clouds <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z003" data-origname="add">that were</tei-add> tinged with an earthlike yel-

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming's eyes had a look in them that one can 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>see in the orbs of a jaded horse. The muscles of his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arms <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_48_z005" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z005" data-origname="del">left</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z005" data-origname="add">felt</tei-add></tei-subst> numb and bloodless. His hands, too, seemed 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>large and awkward as if he were wearing invisible 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>mittens. And there was a great uncertainty about his knee-joints.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The words that comrades had uttered previous to 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the firing began to appear to him. "Oh, say, this is too 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>much of a good thing." "What do they take us fer--why 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>don't they send us supports." "I didn't come here t' fight 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>th' hull damn rebel army."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He began to exaggerate the endurance, the skill 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and the valor of those who were coming. They must be
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>steel machines. Himself, reeling from nervous exhaustion, 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>he could not understand such persistency.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He mechanically lifted his rifle and, catching 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a glimpse of <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_48_z009" data-origname="del">a cantering cluster</tei-del> the thick-spread field,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>he fired a shot at a cantering<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z008" data-origname="del">ly</tei-del> cluster. He stopped 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>then and began to gaze as best he could through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>smoke. He caught changing views of the ground 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>covered with men who were all running and yell-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing like pursued imps.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>To him, it was an onslaught of dragons. He be
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>came like the m<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_48_z006" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_48_z006" data-origname="del">e</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_48_z006" data-origname="add">a</tei-add></tei-subst>n who lost his legs at the ap-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>proach of the red and green monster. He waited
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in a sort of a horrified, listening attitude. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>seemed to shut his eyes and wait to be gobbled.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_48" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="above" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z001" data-origname="metamark">48</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z002" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in the great clouds <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z003" data-origname="add">that were</tei-add> tinged with an earthlike yel-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>low in the sun-rays, and changed to a sor-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ry blue in the shadows.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming's eyes had a look in them that one can 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>see in the orbs of a jaded horse. The muscles of his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arms <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_48_z005" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z005" data-origname="del">left</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z005" data-origname="add">felt</tei-add></tei-subst> numb and bloodless. His hands, too, seemed 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>large and awkward as if he were wearing invisible 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>mittens. And there was a great uncertainty about his knee-joints.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The words that comrades had uttered previous to 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the firing began to appear to him. "Oh, say, this is too 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>much of a good thing." "What do they take us fer--why 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>don't they send us supports." "I didn't come here t' fight 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>th' hull damn rebel army."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He began to exaggerate the endurance, the skill 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and the valor of those who were coming. They must be
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>steel machines. Himself, reeling from nervous exhaustion, 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>he could not understand such persistency.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He mechanically lifted his rifle and, catching 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a glimpse of <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_48_z009" data-origname="del">a cantering cluster</tei-del> the thick-spread field,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>he fired a shot at a cantering<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_48_z008" data-origname="del">ly</tei-del> cluster. He stopped 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>then and began to gaze as best he could through the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>smoke. He caught changing views of the ground 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>covered with men who were all running and yell-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing like pursued imps.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>To him, it was an onslaught of dragons. He be
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>came like the m<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_48_z006" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_48_z006" data-origname="del">e</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_48_z006" data-origname="add">a</tei-add></tei-subst>n who lost his legs at the ap-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>proach of the red and green monster. He waited
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in a sort of a horrified, listening attitude. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>seemed to shut his eyes and wait to be gobbled.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>To him, it was an onslaught of dragons. He be
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>came like the m<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_48_z006" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_48_z006" data-origname="del">e</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_48_z006" data-origname="add">a</tei-add></tei-subst>n who lost his legs at the ap-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>proach of the red and green monster. He waited
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in a sort of a horrified, listening attitude. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>seemed to shut his eyes and wait to be gobbled.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_49" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>49<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>A man near him who up to this time had been work
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z004" data-origname="add">feverishly</tei-add> <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z021" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark>at his rifle, suddenly dropped it <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z005" data-origname="del">r</tei-del> and ran with
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>howls. A lad whose face had born an expression of exalted cour
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>age, the majesty of he who dares give his life, was smitten ab
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ject. He blanched like one who has come to the edge of a cliff
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>at midnight and is suddenly made aware. There was a revel
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ation. He too threw down his gun and <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z007" data-origname="del">ran</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z020" data-origname="add">fled</tei-add>. There was no
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>shame in his face. He ran like a rabbit.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Others began to scamper away through the smoke.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned his head, shaken from his trance by this
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>movement as if the regiment was leaving him behind. He
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>saw the few fleeting forms.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He yelled then with fright and swung about. For
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a moment, in the clamor, he was like a proverbial
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>chicken. He lost the direction of safety. Destruction
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>threatened him from all points.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Directly he began to speed toward the rear
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in great leaps. His rifle and cap were gone. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z010" data-origname="del">His un</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z011" data-origname="del">buttoned coat streamed out</tei-del>.The flap of his cart
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ridge-box <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z013" data-origname="del">and his</tei-del> bobbed wildly. His canteen
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>swung <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z014" data-origname="del">on a cord</tei-del> out behind him. On his face
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>was a <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z015" data-origname="del">on</tei-del> reflected horror of those things which
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>he imagined.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He ran like a blind man. Two or three
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>times, he fell down and once he knocked his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>shoulder so heavily against a tree that he went head-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>long. He felt that death was ever about to thrust
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>him between the shoulder blades.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He ran on mingling with others. He <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z018" data-origname="del">saw men</tei-del> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>vaguely saw men on his right and on his left, and he
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>heard foot-steps behind him. He thought that all
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the regiment was running. Ominous noises were following.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_49" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>49<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>A man near him who up to this time had been work
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z004" data-origname="add">feverishly</tei-add> <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z021" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark>at his rifle, suddenly dropped it <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z005" data-origname="del">r</tei-del> and ran with
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>howls. A lad whose face had born an expression of exalted cour
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>age, the majesty of he who dares give his life, was smitten ab
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ject. He blanched like one who has come to the edge of a cliff
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>at midnight and is suddenly made aware. There was a revel
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ation. He too threw down his gun and <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z007" data-origname="del">ran</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z020" data-origname="add">fled</tei-add>. There was no
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>shame in his face. He ran like a rabbit.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Others began to scamper away through the smoke.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned his head, shaken from his trance by this
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>movement as if the regiment was leaving him behind. He
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>saw the few fleeting forms.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He yelled then with fright and swung about. For
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a moment, in the clamor, he was like a proverbial
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>chicken. He lost the direction of safety. Destruction
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>threatened him from all points.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Directly he began to speed toward the rear
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in great leaps. His rifle and cap were gone. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z010" data-origname="del">His un</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z011" data-origname="del">buttoned coat streamed out</tei-del>.The flap of his cart
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ridge-box <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z013" data-origname="del">and his</tei-del> bobbed wildly. His canteen
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>swung <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z014" data-origname="del">on a cord</tei-del> out behind him. On his face
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>was a <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z015" data-origname="del">on</tei-del> reflected horror of those things which
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>he imagined.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He ran like a blind man. Two or three
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>times, he fell down and once he knocked his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>shoulder so heavily against a tree that he went head-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>long. He felt that death was ever about to thrust
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>him between the shoulder blades.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He ran on mingling with others. He <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z018" data-origname="del">saw men</tei-del> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>vaguely saw men on his right and on his left, and he
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>heard foot-steps behind him. He thought that all
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the regiment was running. Ominous noises were following.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_49" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>49<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>A man near him who up to this time had been work
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z004" data-origname="add">feverishly</tei-add> <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z021" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark>at his rifle, suddenly dropped it <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z005" data-origname="del">r</tei-del> and ran with
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>howls. A lad whose face had born an expression of exalted cour
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>age, the majesty of he who dares give his life, was smitten ab
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ject. He blanched like one who has come to the edge of a cliff
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>at midnight and is suddenly made aware. There was a revel
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ation. He too threw down his gun and <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z007" data-origname="del">ran</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z020" data-origname="add">fled</tei-add>. There was no
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>shame in his face. He ran like a rabbit.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Others began to scamper away through the smoke.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned his head, shaken from his trance by this
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>movement as if the regiment was leaving him behind. He
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>saw the few fleeting forms.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He yelled then with fright and swung about. For
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a moment, in the clamor, he was like a proverbial
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>chicken. He lost the direction of safety. Destruction
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>threatened him from all points.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Directly he began to speed toward the rear
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in great leaps. His rifle and cap were gone. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z010" data-origname="del">His un</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z011" data-origname="del">buttoned coat streamed out</tei-del>.The flap of his cart
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ridge-box <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z013" data-origname="del">and his</tei-del> bobbed wildly. His canteen
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>swung <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z014" data-origname="del">on a cord</tei-del> out behind him. On his face
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>was a <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z015" data-origname="del">on</tei-del> reflected horror of those things which
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>he imagined.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He ran like a blind man. Two or three
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>times, he fell down and once he knocked his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>shoulder so heavily against a tree that he went head-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>long. He felt that death was ever about to thrust
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>him between the shoulder blades.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He ran on mingling with others. He <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z018" data-origname="del">saw men</tei-del> 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>vaguely saw men on his right and on his left, and he
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>heard foot-steps behind him. He thought that all
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the regiment was running. Ominous noises were following.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Directly he began to speed toward the rear

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z011" data-origname="del">buttoned coat streamed out</tei-del>.The flap of his cart
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ridge-box <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z013" data-origname="del">and his</tei-del> bobbed wildly. His canteen

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>was a <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z015" data-origname="del">on</tei-del> reflected horror of those things which

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z004" data-origname="add">feverishly</tei-add> <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z021" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark>at his rifle, suddenly dropped it <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z005" data-origname="del">r</tei-del> and ran with
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>howls. A lad whose face had born an expression of exalted cour
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>age, the majesty of he who dares give his life, was smitten ab
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ject. He blanched like one who has come to the edge of a cliff
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>at midnight and is suddenly made aware. There was a revel
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ation. He too threw down his gun and <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z007" data-origname="del">ran</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z020" data-origname="add">fled</tei-add>. There was no
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>shame in his face. He ran like a rabbit.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Others began to scamper away through the smoke.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned his head, shaken from his trance by this
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>movement as if the regiment was leaving him behind. He

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He yelled then with fright and swung about. For
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a moment, in the clamor, he was like a proverbial

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in great leaps. His rifle and cap were gone. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z010" data-origname="del">His un</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z011" data-origname="del">buttoned coat streamed out</tei-del>.The flap of his cart
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ridge-box <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_49_z013" data-origname="del">and his</tei-del> bobbed wildly. His canteen

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>he imagined.

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>times, he fell down and once he knocked his

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>vaguely saw men on his right and on his left, and he

</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_50" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab">50<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The sound of the footsteps behind him gave him a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>certain, <tei-add place="above" rend="caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z005" data-origname="add">meagre</tei-add> relief. The first clutchings of the dragons would
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>be <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_50_z004" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z004" data-origname="del">uponof</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z004" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add></tei-subst> the men <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z002" data-origname="del">who</tei-del> were following him. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>displayed the zeal of a sprinter in his purpose to keep
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>them in the rear<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z003" data-origname="del" data-empty=""></tei-del>. There was a race.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Shells were hurtling over his head. He imagined
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>them to have rows of vindictively-grinning teeth turned
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>toward <tei-add place="above" rend="caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z004" data-origname="add">him</tei-add> as they passed.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He experienced a thrill of amazement as he
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>passed the battery in the field back of the grove. The
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>artillerymen were going swiftly about their tasks. They
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>were continually bending in coaxing postures over the guns.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>They seemed to be patting them on the back and en-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>couraging them with words. The guns stolid and un-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>daunted, spoke with dogged valor.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The precise gunners were cool save for their
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>eyes which were lifted every chance toward <tei-restore change="dstX" hand="#SC" facs="#rboc-d_50_z009" data-origname="restore">a</tei-restore>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>smoked-wreathed hillock from whence a hostile bat-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tery addressed them. Fleming pitied them as he ran.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Methodical idiots! Machine-like fools! Staying to
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>be eaten up! The face of a youthful rider who was
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>jerking his frantic horse with the abandon of tem-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>per he might display in a placid barn-yard was
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>impressed deep upon his mind. He knew he looked
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="overwrite pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z010" data-origname="del">upon</tei-del> a man who would presently be dead.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He saw a brigade going to the relief of it's
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pestered <tei-restore change="dstX" hand="#SC" facs="#rboc-d_50_z008" data-origname="restore">fellows</tei-restore>. He scrambled into some bushes and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>watched it, sweeping finely, keeping formation in
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>difficult places. The blue of the line was crusted
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with steel-color and brilliant flags projected.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Officers were shouting.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_50" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab">50<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The sound of the footsteps behind him gave him a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>certain, <tei-add place="above" rend="caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z005" data-origname="add">meagre</tei-add> relief. The first clutchings of the dragons would
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>be <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_50_z004" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z004" data-origname="del">uponof</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z004" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add></tei-subst> the men <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z002" data-origname="del">who</tei-del> were following him. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>displayed the zeal of a sprinter in his purpose to keep
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>them in the rear<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z003" data-origname="del" data-empty=""></tei-del>. There was a race.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Shells were hurtling over his head. He imagined
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>them to have rows of vindictively-grinning teeth turned
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>toward <tei-add place="above" rend="caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z004" data-origname="add">him</tei-add> as they passed.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He experienced a thrill of amazement as he
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>passed the battery in the field back of the grove. The
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>artillerymen were going swiftly about their tasks. They
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>were continually bending in coaxing postures over the guns.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>They seemed to be patting them on the back and en-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>couraging them with words. The guns stolid and un-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>daunted, spoke with dogged valor.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The precise gunners were cool save for their
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>eyes which were lifted every chance toward <tei-restore change="dstX" hand="#SC" facs="#rboc-d_50_z009" data-origname="restore">a</tei-restore>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>smoked-wreathed hillock from whence a hostile bat-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tery addressed them. Fleming pitied them as he ran.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Methodical idiots! Machine-like fools! Staying to
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>be eaten up! The face of a youthful rider who was
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>jerking his frantic horse with the abandon of tem-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>per he might display in a placid barn-yard was
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>impressed deep upon his mind. He knew he looked
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="overwrite pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_50_z010" data-origname="del">upon</tei-del> a man who would presently be dead.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He saw a brigade going to the relief of it's
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pestered <tei-restore change="dstX" hand="#SC" facs="#rboc-d_50_z008" data-origname="restore">fellows</tei-restore>. He scrambled into some bushes and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>watched it, sweeping finely, keeping formation in
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>difficult places. The blue of the line was crusted
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with steel-color and brilliant flags projected.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Officers were shouting.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="6" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pestered <tei-restore change="dstX" hand="#SC" facs="#rboc-d_50_z008" data-origname="restore">fellows</tei-restore>. He scrambled into some bushes and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>watched it, sweeping finely, keeping formation in
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>difficult places. The blue of the line was crusted
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with steel-color and brilliant flags projected.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Officers were shouting.
