<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He hung babe-like to Fleming. “I was allus a good
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>friend of your’n, wasn’t I, Flem<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z002" data-origname="del"><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z001" data-origname="del">i</tei-del>ng</tei-del>? An’ it aint much
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>t’ ask, is it, Flem? Jest t’ drag me outa th’ road.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I’d do it fur you, wouldn’t I, Flem?” <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z003" data-origname="del">And keep</tei-del>
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming’s anguish reached <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z005" data-origname="del">the</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z004" data-origname="add">a</tei-add>heat where <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z006" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>scorch-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing sobs shook his chest, but, suddenly Conklin seemed
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to forget all those fears. He became again the
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>grim stalking spectre of a soldier. He went
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>stonily forward. Fleming <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z024" data-origname="del">, striding</tei-del>wished his friend
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to lean upon him but the other always shook his
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>head and strangely protested. <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z026" data-origname="add">"No-- no-- leave me be-- leave me be."</tei-add>
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z009" data-origname="del">eyes</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z010" data-origname="add">look</tei-add> again <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z011" data-origname="del">became</tei-del> was fixed upon
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the unknown. He moved with mysteri<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="del">os</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="add">ous</tei-add></tei-subst> purpose.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And all of Fleming's offers he brushed aside. "No--
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>no-- leave me be-- leave me be--"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming had to follow after.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z012" data-origname="del">At last</tei-del>Presently, the latter heard <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z014" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="inline" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z015" data-origname="add">a</tei-add> voice talk-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing softly near his shoulder. Turning, he saw that
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>it belonged to the tattered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z017" data-origname="del">man.</tei-del> <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z018" data-origname="add">soldier.</tei-add> "Ye'd better
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tak'im outa th' road, pardner. There's a bat'try com-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in' helitywhoop an' he'll git run over. He's goner any-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>how in about five minutes-- yeh kin see that. Ye'd
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>better tak'im outa th' road<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z019" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="del">w</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="add">W</tei-add></tei-subst>here th' blazes does he
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>git his stren'th from?"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Lord knows," cried Fleming. He  was shaking
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands helplessly.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He ran forward and grasped Conklin by the
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arm. "Jim<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="del">,</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="add">--</tei-add></tei-subst>Jim," he coaxed, "come with me."

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>it belonged to the tattered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z017" data-origname="del">man.</tei-del> <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z018" data-origname="add">soldier.</tei-add> "Ye'd better

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>how in about five minutes-- yeh kin see that. Ye'd
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>better tak'im outa th' road<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z019" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="del">w</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="add">W</tei-add></tei-subst>here th' blazes does he
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>git his stren'th from?"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Lord knows," cried Fleming. He  was shaking
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands helplessly.

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arm. <tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_67" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="margin-top" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_67_z022" data-origname="metamark">67</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Conklin still begged in a lowly way. <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He hung babe-like to Fleming. “I was allus a good
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>friend of your’n, wasn’t I, Flem<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z002" data-origname="del"><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z001" data-origname="del">i</tei-del>ng</tei-del>? An’ it aint much
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>t’ ask, is it, Flem? Jest t’ drag me outa th’ road.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I’d do it fur you, wouldn’t I, Flem?” <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z003" data-origname="del">And keep</tei-del>
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming’s anguish reached <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z005" data-origname="del">the</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z004" data-origname="add">a</tei-add>heat where <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z006" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>scorch-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing sobs shook his chest, but, suddenly Conklin seemed
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to forget all those fears. He became again the
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>grim stalking spectre of a soldier. He went
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>stonily forward. Fleming <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z024" data-origname="del">, striding</tei-del>wished his friend
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to lean upon him but the other always shook his
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>head and strangely protested. <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z026" data-origname="add">"No-- no-- leave me be-- leave me be."</tei-add>
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z009" data-origname="del">eyes</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z010" data-origname="add">look</tei-add> again <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z011" data-origname="del">became</tei-del> was fixed upon
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the unknown. He moved with mysteri<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="del">os</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="add">ous</tei-add></tei-subst> purpose.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And all of Fleming's offers he brushed aside. "No--
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>no-- leave me be-- leave me be--"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming had to follow after.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z012" data-origname="del">At last</tei-del>Presently, the latter heard <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z014" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="inline" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z015" data-origname="add">a</tei-add> voice talk-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing softly near his shoulder. Turning, he saw that
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>it belonged to the tattered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z017" data-origname="del">man.</tei-del> <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z018" data-origname="add">soldier.</tei-add> "Ye'd better
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tak'im outa th' road, pardner. There's a bat'try com-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in' helitywhoop an' he'll git run over. He's goner any-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>how in about five minutes-- yeh kin see that. Ye'd
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>better tak'im outa th' road<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z019" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="del">w</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="add">W</tei-add></tei-subst>here th' blazes does he
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>git his stren'th from?"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Lord knows," cried Fleming. He  was shaking
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands helplessly.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He ran forward and grasped Conklin by the
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arm. "Jim<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="del">,</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="add">--</tei-add></tei-subst>Jim," he coaxed, "come with me."

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>it belonged to the tattered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z017" data-origname="del">man.</tei-del> <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z018" data-origname="add">soldier.</tei-add> "Ye'd better

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>how in about five minutes-- yeh kin see that. Ye'd
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>better tak'im outa th' road<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z019" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="del">w</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="add">W</tei-add></tei-subst>here th' blazes does he
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>git his stren'th from?"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Lord knows," cried Fleming. He  was shaking
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands helplessly.

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arm. <tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_67" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="margin-top" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_67_z022" data-origname="metamark">67</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Conklin still begged in a lowly way. <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He hung babe-like to Fleming. “I was allus a good
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>friend of your’n, wasn’t I, Flem<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z002" data-origname="del"><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z001" data-origname="del">i</tei-del>ng</tei-del>? An’ it aint much
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>t’ ask, is it, Flem? Jest t’ drag me outa th’ road.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I’d do it fur you, wouldn’t I, Flem?” <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z003" data-origname="del">And keep</tei-del>
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming’s anguish reached <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z005" data-origname="del">the</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z004" data-origname="add">a</tei-add>heat where <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z006" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>scorch-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing sobs shook his chest, but, suddenly Conklin seemed
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to forget all those fears. He became again the
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>grim stalking spectre of a soldier. He went
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>stonily forward. Fleming <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z024" data-origname="del">, striding</tei-del>wished his friend
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to lean upon him but the other always shook his
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>head and strangely protested. <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z026" data-origname="add">"No-- no-- leave me be-- leave me be."</tei-add>
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z009" data-origname="del">eyes</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z010" data-origname="add">look</tei-add> again <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z011" data-origname="del">became</tei-del> was fixed upon
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the unknown. He moved with mysteri<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="del">os</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="add">ous</tei-add></tei-subst> purpose.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And all of Fleming's offers he brushed aside. "No--
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>no-- leave me be-- leave me be--"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming had to follow after.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z012" data-origname="del">At last</tei-del>Presently, the latter heard <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z014" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="inline" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z015" data-origname="add">a</tei-add> voice talk-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing softly near his shoulder. Turning, he saw that
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>it belonged to the tattered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z017" data-origname="del">man.</tei-del> <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z018" data-origname="add">soldier.</tei-add> "Ye'd better
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tak'im outa th' road, pardner. There's a bat'try com-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in' helitywhoop an' he'll git run over. He's goner any-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>how in about five minutes-- yeh kin see that. Ye'd
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>better tak'im outa th' road<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z019" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="del">w</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="add">W</tei-add></tei-subst>here th' blazes does he
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>git his stren'th from?"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Lord knows," cried Fleming. He  was shaking
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands helplessly.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He ran forward and grasped Conklin by the
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arm. "Jim<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="del">,</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="add">--</tei-add></tei-subst>Jim," he coaxed, "come with me."

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>it belonged to the tattered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z017" data-origname="del">man.</tei-del> <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z018" data-origname="add">soldier.</tei-add> "Ye'd better

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>how in about five minutes-- yeh kin see that. Ye'd
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>better tak'im outa th' road<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z019" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="del">w</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="add">W</tei-add></tei-subst>here th' blazes does he
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>git his stren'th from?"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Lord knows," cried Fleming. He  was shaking
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands helplessly.

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arm. <tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_67" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="margin-top" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_67_z022" data-origname="metamark">67</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Conklin still begged in a lowly way. <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He hung babe-like to Fleming. “I was allus a good
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>friend of your’n, wasn’t I, Flem<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z002" data-origname="del"><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z001" data-origname="del">i</tei-del>ng</tei-del>? An’ it aint much
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>t’ ask, is it, Flem? Jest t’ drag me outa th’ road.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I’d do it fur you, wouldn’t I, Flem?” <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z003" data-origname="del">And keep</tei-del>
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming’s anguish reached <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z005" data-origname="del">the</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z004" data-origname="add">a</tei-add>heat where <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z006" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>scorch-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing sobs shook his chest, but, suddenly Conklin seemed
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to forget all those fears. He became again the
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>grim stalking spectre of a soldier. He went
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>stonily forward. Fleming <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z024" data-origname="del">, striding</tei-del>wished his friend
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to lean upon him but the other always shook his
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>head and strangely protested. <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z026" data-origname="add">"No-- no-- leave me be-- leave me be."</tei-add>
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z009" data-origname="del">eyes</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z010" data-origname="add">look</tei-add> again <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z011" data-origname="del">became</tei-del> was fixed upon
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the unknown. He moved with mysteri<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="del">os</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="add">ous</tei-add></tei-subst> purpose.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And all of Fleming's offers he brushed aside. "No--
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>no-- leave me be-- leave me be--"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming had to follow after.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z012" data-origname="del">At last</tei-del>Presently, the latter heard <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z014" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="inline" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z015" data-origname="add">a</tei-add> voice talk-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing softly near his shoulder. Turning, he saw that
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>it belonged to the tattered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z017" data-origname="del">man.</tei-del> <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z018" data-origname="add">soldier.</tei-add> "Ye'd better
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tak'im outa th' road, pardner. There's a bat'try com-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in' helitywhoop an' he'll git run over. He's goner any-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>how in about five minutes-- yeh kin see that. Ye'd
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>better tak'im outa th' road<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z019" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="del">w</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="add">W</tei-add></tei-subst>here th' blazes does he
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>git his stren'th from?"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Lord knows," cried Fleming. He  was shaking
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands helplessly.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He ran forward and grasped Conklin by the
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arm. "Jim<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="del">,</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="add">--</tei-add></tei-subst>Jim," he coaxed, "come with me."

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>it belonged to the tattered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z017" data-origname="del">man.</tei-del> <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z018" data-origname="add">soldier.</tei-add> "Ye'd better

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>how in about five minutes-- yeh kin see that. Ye'd
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>better tak'im outa th' road<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z019" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="del">w</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="add">W</tei-add></tei-subst>here th' blazes does he
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>git his stren'th from?"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Lord knows," cried Fleming. He  was shaking
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands helplessly.

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arm. <tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_67" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="margin-top" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_67_z022" data-origname="metamark">67</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Conklin still begged in a lowly way. <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He hung babe-like to Fleming. “I was allus a good
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>friend of your’n, wasn’t I, Flem<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z002" data-origname="del"><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z001" data-origname="del">i</tei-del>ng</tei-del>? An’ it aint much
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>t’ ask, is it, Flem? Jest t’ drag me outa th’ road.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I’d do it fur you, wouldn’t I, Flem?” <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z003" data-origname="del">And keep</tei-del>
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming’s anguish reached <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z005" data-origname="del">the</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z004" data-origname="add">a</tei-add>heat where <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z006" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>scorch-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing sobs shook his chest, but, suddenly Conklin seemed
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to forget all those fears. He became again the
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>grim stalking spectre of a soldier. He went
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>stonily forward. Fleming <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z024" data-origname="del">, striding</tei-del>wished his friend
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to lean upon him but the other always shook his
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>head and strangely protested. <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z026" data-origname="add">"No-- no-- leave me be-- leave me be."</tei-add>
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z009" data-origname="del">eyes</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z010" data-origname="add">look</tei-add> again <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z011" data-origname="del">became</tei-del> was fixed upon
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the unknown. He moved with mysteri<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="del">os</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="add">ous</tei-add></tei-subst> purpose.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And all of Fleming's offers he brushed aside. "No--
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>no-- leave me be-- leave me be--"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming had to follow after.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z012" data-origname="del">At last</tei-del>Presently, the latter heard <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z014" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="inline" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z015" data-origname="add">a</tei-add> voice talk-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing softly near his shoulder. Turning, he saw that
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>it belonged to the tattered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z017" data-origname="del">man.</tei-del> <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z018" data-origname="add">soldier.</tei-add> "Ye'd better
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tak'im outa th' road, pardner. There's a bat'try com-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in' helitywhoop an' he'll git run over. He's goner any-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>how in about five minutes-- yeh kin see that. Ye'd
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>better tak'im outa th' road<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z019" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="del">w</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="add">W</tei-add></tei-subst>here th' blazes does he
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>git his stren'th from?"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Lord knows," cried Fleming. He  was shaking
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands helplessly.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He ran forward and grasped Conklin by the
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arm. "Jim<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="del">,</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="add">--</tei-add></tei-subst>Jim," he coaxed, "come with me."

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>it belonged to the tattered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z017" data-origname="del">man.</tei-del> <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z018" data-origname="add">soldier.</tei-add> "Ye'd better

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>how in about five minutes-- yeh kin see that. Ye'd
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>better tak'im outa th' road<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z019" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="del">w</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="add">W</tei-add></tei-subst>here th' blazes does he
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>git his stren'th from?"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Lord knows," cried Fleming. He  was shaking
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands helplessly.

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arm. <tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_67" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="margin-top" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_67_z022" data-origname="metamark">67</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Conklin still begged in a lowly way. <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He hung babe-like to Fleming. “I was allus a good
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>friend of your’n, wasn’t I, Flem<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z002" data-origname="del"><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z001" data-origname="del">i</tei-del>ng</tei-del>? An’ it aint much
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>t’ ask, is it, Flem? Jest t’ drag me outa th’ road.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>I’d do it fur you, wouldn’t I, Flem?” <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z003" data-origname="del">And keep</tei-del>
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming’s anguish reached <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z005" data-origname="del">the</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z004" data-origname="add">a</tei-add>heat where <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z006" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>scorch-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing sobs shook his chest, but, suddenly Conklin seemed
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to forget all those fears. He became again the
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>grim stalking spectre of a soldier. He went
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>stonily forward. Fleming <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z024" data-origname="del">, striding</tei-del>wished his friend
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to lean upon him but the other always shook his
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>head and strangely protested. <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z026" data-origname="add">"No-- no-- leave me be-- leave me be."</tei-add>
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z009" data-origname="del">eyes</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z010" data-origname="add">look</tei-add> again <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z011" data-origname="del">became</tei-del> was fixed upon
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the unknown. He moved with mysteri<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="del">os</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z025" data-origname="add">ous</tei-add></tei-subst> purpose.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And all of Fleming's offers he brushed aside. "No--
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>no-- leave me be-- leave me be--"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming had to follow after.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z012" data-origname="del">At last</tei-del>Presently, the latter heard <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z014" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="inline" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z015" data-origname="add">a</tei-add> voice talk-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing softly near his shoulder. Turning, he saw that
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>it belonged to the tattered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z017" data-origname="del">man.</tei-del> <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z018" data-origname="add">soldier.</tei-add> "Ye'd better
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tak'im outa th' road, pardner. There's a bat'try com-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in' helitywhoop an' he'll git run over. He's goner any-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>how in about five minutes-- yeh kin see that. Ye'd
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>better tak'im outa th' road<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z019" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="del">w</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="add">W</tei-add></tei-subst>here th' blazes does he
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>git his stren'th from?"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Lord knows," cried Fleming. He  was shaking
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands helplessly.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He ran forward and grasped Conklin by the
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arm. "Jim<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="del">,</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="add">--</tei-add></tei-subst>Jim," he coaxed, "come with me."

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z012" data-origname="del">At last</tei-del>Presently, the latter heard <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z014" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="inline" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z015" data-origname="add">a</tei-add> voice talk-

<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>it belonged to the tattered <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z017" data-origname="del">man.</tei-del> <tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z018" data-origname="add">soldier.</tei-add> "Ye'd better
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tak'im outa th' road, pardner. There's a bat'try com-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>in' helitywhoop an' he'll git run over. He's goner any-
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>how in about five minutes-- yeh kin see that. Ye'd
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>better tak'im outa th' road<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z019" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="del">w</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_67_z020" data-origname="add">W</tei-add></tei-subst>here th' blazes does he
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>git his stren'th from?"
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Lord knows," cried Fleming. He  was shaking
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands helplessly.
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He ran forward and grasped Conklin by the
<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>arm. "Jim<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="del">,</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_67_z021" data-origname="add">--</tei-add></tei-subst>Jim," he coaxed, "come with me."
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="9" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_68" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="margin-top" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_68-0001" data-origname="metamark">68</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Conklin tried weakly to wrench away. "Huh?" he said 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>vacantly. He stared at Fleming for a moment. At 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>last, he spoke: "Oh, inteh th' fields? Oh!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He went blindly through the grass. Fleming turning 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to look at the lashing riders and jouncing guns of the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>battery was startled from his view by a cry from the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tattered soldier.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Great Gawd, he's runnin'!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Looking about swiftly, Fleming saw his friend run-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ning in a staggering and stumbling way toward a 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>little clump of bushes. His heart almost wrenched it-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>self from his body at the sight. He made a noise 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of infinite pain and started in pursuit.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was a grotesque race.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>When he overtook Conklin he began to beg him 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with all the words he could find. "Jim--Jim--what 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>are yeh doin'--what makes yeh do this way--y<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_68-0003" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_68-0003" data-origname="del">ou</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_68-0003" data-origname="add">eh</tei-add></tei-subst>'ll
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>hurt yerself."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The same mysterious purpose was in Conklin's 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>face. He protested dully. "No--no--don't tech me-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>leave me be--leave me be"--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming fiiled with wonder at the idea which 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>seemed to absorb his friend<tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_68_z004" data-origname="del">.</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_68_z004" data-origname="add">,</tei-add> began quaveringly to 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>question him. "Where yeh goin', Jim? What <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_68-0005" data-origname="del">are</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>yeh thinkin' about? What yeh tryin' t' do? Where 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>yeh goin?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Conklin faced about as upon a relentless 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pursuer. In his eyes, there was an appeal. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Leave me be, won't yeh? Leave me be!"
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="9" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_68" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="margin-top" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_68-0001" data-origname="metamark">68</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Conklin tried weakly to wrench away.   <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with all the words he could find. "Jim--Jim--what 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>are yeh doin'--what makes yeh do this way--y<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_68-0003" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_68-0003" data-origname="del">ou</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_68-0003" data-origname="add">eh</tei-add></tei-subst>'ll
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>hurt yerself."
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The same mysterious purpose was in Conklin's 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>face. He protested dully. "No--no--don't tech me-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>leave me be--leave me be"--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming fiiled with wonder at the idea which 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>seemed to absorb his friend<tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_68_z004" data-origname="del">.</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_68_z004" data-origname="add">,</tei-add> began quaveringly to 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>question him. "Where yeh goin', Jim? What <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_68-0005" data-origname="del">are</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>yeh thinkin' about? What yeh tryin' t' do? Where 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>yeh goin?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Conklin faced about as upon a relentless 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pursuer. In his eyes, there was an appeal. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Leave me be, won't yeh? Leave me be!"
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="9" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_69" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="margin-top" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dStX" facs="#rboc-d_69_z006" data-origname="metamark">69</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_69_z026" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming started back. "Why, Jim," he said in 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a dazed way.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Conklin turned and lurch<tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_69_z008" data-origname="del">ed dangero</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_69_z007" data-origname="add">ing dangerously,</tei-add> went 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on. Fleming and <tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_69_z009" data-origname="add">the</tei-add> tattered soldier followed, sneak-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing as if whipped, feeling unable to face

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing as if whipped, feeling unable to face

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing as if whipped, feeling unable to face

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing as if whipped, feeling unable to face

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing as if whipped, feeling unable to face

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing as if whipped, feeling unable to face

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing as if whipped, feeling unable to face

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing as if whipped, feeling unable to face

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on. Fleming and <tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_69_z009" data-origname="add">the</tei-add> tattered soldier followed, sneak-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing as if whipped, feeling unable to face 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the stricken man if <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_69_z010" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_69_z010" data-origname="del">s</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_69_z010" data-origname="add">h</tei-add></tei-subst>e should again confront 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>them.

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and stand motionless.   <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>upon his face a<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_69_z032" data-origname="add">n</tei-add>e expression as if he had at last 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>found the spot for which he <tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_69_z020" data-origname="add">had</tei-add> struggled. <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_69_z021" data-origname="del">a</tei-del> His 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>spare figure was erect. The bloody hands were 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>quietly at his <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_69_z034" data-origname="del">hand</tei-del> sides. He was waiting with 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>patience for something <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_69_z024" data-origname="del">which</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_69_z023" data-origname="add">that</tei-add> was coming.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There were years of silence. The chest of the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>doomed soldier heaved with a strained motion. Once

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his voice in a last, supreme call.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Jim--Jim--Jim"--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His friend open<tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_69_z030" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_69_z030" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_69_z030" data-origname="add">e</tei-add></tei-subst>d his lips and spoke<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_69_z036" data-origname="add">,</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_69_z027" data-origname="del">in a</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>gratingly<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_69_z028" data-origname="add">.</tei-add><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_69_z029" data-origname="del">and monotonous voice.</tei-del> He shook his head. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Leave me be! Leave me be!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Suddenly, his form stiffened and straightened. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Then it was shaken by a prolonged ague. He 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>stared into space. It was seen that there was a 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>curious and profound dignity in the firm 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>lines of his awful face.

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_70" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="margin-top" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_70_z003" data-origname="metamark">70</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_70_z001" data-origname="del">Finally</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_70_z002" data-origname="add">Presently,</tei-add> he seemed invaded by a creeping ague
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>that gradually enveloped him. For a moment,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the tremor of his legs made him dance a sort of a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>hideous horn-pipe. His arms beat wildly about his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>head. His tall figure grew <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dStX" facs="#rboc-d_70_z007" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_70_z005" data-origname="add">suddenly</tei-add> to <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_70_z006" data-origname="del">sudden</tei-del> unnatural
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>proportions then it began to swing slowly forward
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>like a falling tree. A last muscular contortion
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>caused the left shoulder to <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z007" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z008" data-origname="add">first</tei-add> strike the ground<tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z010" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z009" data-origname="del">fir</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The body seemed to bounce a little way from
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the earth. "Gawd," said the tattered soldier.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming had watched, spell-bound, these
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rites of a departing life, this dance of death.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His face had been twisted into every form of agony
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>that he had imagined for his friend.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He now sprang to his <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_70_z014" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z014" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z014" data-origname="add">feet</tei-add></tei-subst> and gazed at
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the paste-like face. The mouth was open and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the teeth showed in a laugh.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>As the flap of the blue jacket fell away
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from the body, he could see that the side
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>looked as if it had been chewed by wolves.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned toward the battle ground. His
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>hands were clenched<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z011" data-origname="del">.</tei-del> and a rage was upon his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>face. He seemed about to deliver a phillipic.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Hell"--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z012" data-origname="del">fierce</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z013" data-origname="add">red</tei-add> sun was pasted in the sky like
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a fierce wafer.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="10" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>caused the left shoulder to <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z007" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z008" data-origname="add">first</tei-add> strike the ground<tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z010" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z009" data-origname="del">fir</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The body seemed to bounce a little way from
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the earth. "Gawd," said the tattered soldier.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming had watched, spell-bound, these
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rites of a departing life, this dance of death.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His face had been twisted into every form of agony
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>that he had imagined for his friend.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He now sprang to his <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_70_z014" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z014" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z014" data-origname="add">feet</tei-add></tei-subst> and gazed at
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the paste-like face. The mouth was open and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the teeth showed in a laugh.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>As the flap of the blue jacket fell away
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from the body, he could see that the side
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>looked as if it had been chewed by wolves.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned toward the battle ground. His
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>hands were clenched<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z011" data-origname="del">.</tei-del> and a rage was upon his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>face. He seemed about to deliver a phillipic.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Hell"--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z012" data-origname="del">fierce</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z013" data-origname="add">red</tei-add> sun was pasted in the sky like
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a fierce wafer.

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rites of a departing life, this dance of death.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His face had been twisted into every form of agony
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>that he had imagined for his friend.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He now sprang to his <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_70_z014" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z014" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z014" data-origname="add">feet</tei-add></tei-subst> and gazed at
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the paste-like face. The mouth was open and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the teeth showed in a laugh.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>As the flap of the blue jacket fell away
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from the body, he could see that the side
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>looked as if it had been chewed by wolves.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming turned toward the battle ground. His
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>hands were clenched<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z011" data-origname="del">.</tei-del> and a rage was upon his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>face. He seemed about to deliver a phillipic.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Hell"--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z012" data-origname="del">fierce</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z013" data-origname="add">red</tei-add> sun was pasted in the sky like
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a fierce wafer.

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_70" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="margin-top" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_70_z003" data-origname="metamark">70</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_70_z001" data-origname="del">Finally</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_70_z002" data-origname="add">Presently,</tei-add> he seemed invaded by a creeping ague

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>hideous horn-pipe. His arms beat wildly about his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>head. His tall figure grew <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dStX" facs="#rboc-d_70_z007" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_70_z005" data-origname="add">suddenly</tei-add> to <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_70_z006" data-origname="del">sudden</tei-del> unnatural
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>proportions then it began to swing slowly forward
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>like a falling tree. A last muscular contortion
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>caused the left shoulder to <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z007" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z008" data-origname="add">first</tei-add> strike the ground<tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z010" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z009" data-origname="del">fir</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The body seemed to bounce a little way from
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the earth. "Gawd," said the tattered soldier.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming had watched, spell-bound, these
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rites of a departing life, this dance of death.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His face had been twisted into every form of agony
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>that he had imagined for his friend.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He now sprang to his <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_70_z014" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z014" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z014" data-origname="add">feet</tei-add></tei-subst> and gazed at
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the paste-like face. The mouth was open and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the teeth showed in a laugh.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>As the flap of the blue jacket fell away
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>from the body, he could see that the side
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>looked as if it had been chewed by wolves.

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>hands were clenched<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z011" data-origname="del">.</tei-del> and a rage was upon his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>face. He seemed about to deliver a phillipic.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Hell"--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z012" data-origname="del">fierce</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstB" facs="#rboc-d_70_z013" data-origname="add">red</tei-add> sun was pasted in the sky like
