  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>But, as<tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_84_z020" data-origname="add"> he</tei-add> went on, he began to feel that, after all,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_84_z022" data-origname="del">his rebellion, nature perhaps had not concentrated
  herself against him, or, at least, that</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_84_z023" data-origname="add"><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_84_z031" data-origname="del">him</tei-del></tei-add>
  nature <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_84_z024" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_84_z024" data-origname="del">would</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_84_z024" data-origname="add" data-empty=""></tei-add></tei-subst> not blame him for his rebellion.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_84_z025" data-origname="add">still</tei-add> distinctly felt that he was arrayed against

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_84_z028" data-origname="del">He w</tei-del> It was merely law.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Nature had provided her creations with various
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>defenses and ways to escape that they might fight or

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_85" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb> <tei-ab data-origname="ab">85<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>being relentlessly pursued, it was not his duty to
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>bow <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z003" data-origname="add">to</tei-add> <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z023" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark>the inevitable. On the contrary, it was his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>business to kick and scratch and bite like a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>child in the hands of a parent. And he would
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>be saved according to the importance of his strength.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His egotism made him feel <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z016" data-origname="del">safe</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z015" data-origname="add">secure</tei-add> for a time from
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the iron hands.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It being in his mind that he <tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z005" data-origname="add">had</tei-add> solved those mat-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ters, he eagerly applied his <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z018" data-origname="del">laws</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z017" data-origname="add">findings</tei-add> to the incident of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his own flight from the battle. It was not a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fault; it was a law. It was--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>But he saw that when he had made a vin-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>dicating structure of great principles, it was the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>calm toes of tradition that kicked it all down a-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>bout his ears. He immediately antagonized then this
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>devotion to the by-gone; this universal <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z020" data-origname="del">worship</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z019" data-origname="add">adoration</tei-add> of the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>past. From the bitter pinnacle of his wisdom he
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>saw that mankind not only worshipped the gods of the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ashes but that the gods of the ashes were worshipped
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>because they were the gods of the ashes.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z009" data-origname="del">He had a feeling that he was the coming
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>profhet of a scocial reconstuction. Far down in
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his being<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z010" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>, in the hidden, untouched currents of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his soul, <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z011" data-origname="del">there was born</tei-del>he saw born a voice.</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He percieved <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z012" data-origname="del">with bitterness</tei-del>with anger the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>present state of <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z013" data-origname="del">his</tei-del>affairs in <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z022" data-origname="del">his</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z021" data-origname="add">it's</tei-add> bearing upon his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>case.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And he resolved to reform it all.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="12" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_85" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb> <tei-ab data-origname="ab">85<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>being relentlessly pursued, it was not his duty to
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>bow <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z003" data-origname="add">to</tei-add> <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z023" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark>the inevitable. On the contrary, it was his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>business to kick and scratch and bite like a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>child in the hands of a parent. And he would
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>be saved according to the importance of his strength.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His egotism made him feel <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z016" data-origname="del">safe</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z015" data-origname="add">secure</tei-add> for a time from
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the iron hands.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It being in his mind that he <tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z005" data-origname="add">had</tei-add> solved those mat-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ters, he eagerly applied his <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z018" data-origname="del">laws</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z017" data-origname="add">findings</tei-add> to the incident of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his own flight from the battle. It was not a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fault; it was a law. It was--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>But he saw that when he had made a vin-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>dicating structure of great principles, it was the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>calm toes of tradition that kicked it all down a-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>bout his ears. He immediately antagonized then this
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>devotion to the by-gone; this universal <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z020" data-origname="del">worship</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z019" data-origname="add">adoration</tei-add> of the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>past. From the bitter pinnacle of his wisdom he
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>saw that mankind not only worshipped the gods of the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ashes but that the gods of the ashes were worshipped
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>because they were the gods of the ashes.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z009" data-origname="del">He had a feeling that he was the coming
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>profhet of a scocial reconstuction. Far down in
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his being<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z010" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>, in the hidden, untouched currents of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his soul, <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z011" data-origname="del">there was born</tei-del>he saw born a voice.</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He percieved <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z012" data-origname="del">with bitterness</tei-del>with anger the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>present state of <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z013" data-origname="del">his</tei-del>affairs in <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z022" data-origname="del">his</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z021" data-origname="add">it's</tei-add> bearing upon his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>case.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And he resolved to reform it all.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="12" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_85" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb> <tei-ab data-origname="ab">85<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>being relentlessly pursued, it was not his duty to
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>bow <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z003" data-origname="add">to</tei-add> <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z023" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark>the inevitable. On the contrary, it was his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>business to kick and scratch and bite like a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>child in the hands of a parent. And he would
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>be saved according to the importance of his strength.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His egotism made him feel <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z016" data-origname="del">safe</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z015" data-origname="add">secure</tei-add> for a time from
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the iron hands.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It being in his mind that he <tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z005" data-origname="add">had</tei-add> solved those mat-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ters, he eagerly applied his <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z018" data-origname="del">laws</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z017" data-origname="add">findings</tei-add> to the incident of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his own flight from the battle. It was not a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fault; it was a law. It was--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>But he saw that when he had made a vin-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>dicating structure of great principles, it was the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>calm toes of tradition that kicked it all down a-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>bout his ears. He immediately antagonized then this
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>devotion to the by-gone; this universal <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z020" data-origname="del">worship</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z019" data-origname="add">adoration</tei-add> of the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>past. From the bitter pinnacle of his wisdom he
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>saw that mankind not only worshipped the gods of the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ashes but that the gods of the ashes were worshipped
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>because they were the gods of the ashes.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z009" data-origname="del">He had a feeling that he was the coming
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>profhet of a scocial reconstuction. Far down in
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his being<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z010" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>, in the hidden, untouched currents of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his soul, <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z011" data-origname="del">there was born</tei-del>he saw born a voice.</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He percieved <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z012" data-origname="del">with bitterness</tei-del>with anger the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>present state of <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z013" data-origname="del">his</tei-del>affairs in <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z022" data-origname="del">his</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z021" data-origname="add">it's</tei-add> bearing upon his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>case.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And he resolved to reform it all.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="12" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_85" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb> <tei-ab data-origname="ab">85<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>being relentlessly pursued, it was not his duty to
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>bow <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z003" data-origname="add">to</tei-add> <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z023" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark>the inevitable. On the contrary, it was his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>business to kick and scratch and bite like a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>child in the hands of a parent. And he would
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>be saved according to the importance of his strength.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His egotism made him feel <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z016" data-origname="del">safe</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z015" data-origname="add">secure</tei-add> for a time from
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the iron hands.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It being in his mind that he <tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z005" data-origname="add">had</tei-add> solved those mat-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ters, he eagerly applied his <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z018" data-origname="del">laws</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z017" data-origname="add">findings</tei-add> to the incident of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his own flight from the battle. It was not a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fault; it was a law. It was--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>But he saw that when he had made a vin-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>dicating structure of great principles, it was the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>calm toes of tradition that kicked it all down a-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>bout his ears. He immediately antagonized then this
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>devotion to the by-gone; this universal <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z020" data-origname="del">worship</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z019" data-origname="add">adoration</tei-add> of the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>past. From the bitter pinnacle of his wisdom he
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>saw that mankind not only worshipped the gods of the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ashes but that the gods of the ashes were worshipped
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>because they were the gods of the ashes.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z009" data-origname="del">He had a feeling that he was the coming
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>profhet of a scocial reconstuction. Far down in
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his being<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z010" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>, in the hidden, untouched currents of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his soul, <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z011" data-origname="del">there was born</tei-del>he saw born a voice.</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He percieved <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z012" data-origname="del">with bitterness</tei-del>with anger the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>present state of <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z013" data-origname="del">his</tei-del>affairs in <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z022" data-origname="del">his</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z021" data-origname="add">it's</tei-add> bearing upon his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>case.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And he resolved to reform it all.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="12" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_85" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb> <tei-ab data-origname="ab">85<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>being relentlessly pursued, it was not his duty to
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>bow <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z003" data-origname="add">to</tei-add> <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z023" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark>the inevitable. On the contrary, it was his
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>business to kick and scratch and bite like a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>child in the hands of a parent. And he would
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>be saved according to the importance of his strength.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His egotism made him feel <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z016" data-origname="del">safe</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z015" data-origname="add">secure</tei-add> for a time from
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the iron hands.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It being in his mind that he <tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z005" data-origname="add">had</tei-add> solved those mat-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ters, he eagerly applied his <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z018" data-origname="del">laws</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z017" data-origname="add">findings</tei-add> to the incident of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his own flight from the battle. It was not a
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fault; it was a law. It was--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>But he saw that when he had made a vin-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>dicating structure of great principles, it was the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>calm toes of tradition that kicked it all down a-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>bout his ears. He immediately antagonized then this
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>devotion to the by-gone; this universal <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z020" data-origname="del">worship</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z019" data-origname="add">adoration</tei-add> of the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>past. From the bitter pinnacle of his wisdom he
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>saw that mankind not only worshipped the gods of the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ashes but that the gods of the ashes were worshipped
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>because they were the gods of the ashes.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z009" data-origname="del">He had a feeling that he was the coming
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>profhet of a scocial reconstuction. Far down in
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his being<tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z010" data-origname="del">s</tei-del>, in the hidden, untouched currents of
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his soul, <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z011" data-origname="del">there was born</tei-del>he saw born a voice.</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He percieved <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z012" data-origname="del">with bitterness</tei-del>with anger the 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>present state of <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z013" data-origname="del">his</tei-del>affairs in <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z022" data-origname="del">his</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z021" data-origname="add">it's</tei-add> bearing upon his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>case.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And he resolved to reform it all.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="12" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>child in the hands of a parent. And he would
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>be saved according to the importance of his strength.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His egotism made him feel <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z016" data-origname="del">safe</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_85_z015" data-origname="add">secure</tei-add> for a time from

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_90" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="margin-top" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_90_z018" data-origname="metamark">90</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>XIII<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_90_z001" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z001" data-origname="del">sl</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z001" data-origname="add">co</tei-add></tei-subst>lumn that had butted stoutly at the obstacles in the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>roadway was barely out of Fleming's sight before he saw
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>dark waves of men come sweeping out of the woods and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>down through the fields. He knew at once that the steel
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fibres had been washed from their hearts. They were burst
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing from their coats and their equipments as from en
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tangling things. They charged down upo<tei-restore change="dstX" hand="#SC" facs="#rboc-d_90_z015" data-origname="restore">n</tei-restore> him like ter
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rified buffalos.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Behind them, blue smoke curled and clouded,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and, through the thickets, he could sometimes <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z003" data-origname="add">see</tei-add><tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_90_z017" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> a dis
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tant, pink glare. The <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z004" data-origname="del">cannon's'</tei-del> voices of the cannon
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>were clamoring in an interminable chorus.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming was horror-stricken. He stared in pain
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and amazement. He forgot that nature had pointed
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>him out as a victim. He again lost all concern for
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>himself. He threw aside his mental pamphlets on the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>philosophy of the retreated and rules for the guid
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ance of the doomed.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The fight was lost. The foe was coming
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>storm-wise to flood the army.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Within him there was something that bade him
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>cry out. He had the impulse to make a rallying <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z005" data-origname="del">or</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>speech, to sing a battle-hymn, but he could only
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>get his tongue to call out into the air: "Why--why--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>what--what's th' matter?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Soon he was in the midst of them. They were
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>leaping and scampering all about him. Their blanched
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>faces shone in the dusk.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="13" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_90" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="margin-top" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_90_z018" data-origname="metamark">90</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>XIII<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_90_z001" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z001" data-origname="del">sl</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z001" data-origname="add">co</tei-add></tei-subst>lumn that had butted stoutly at the obstacles in the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>roadway was barely out of Fleming's sight before he saw
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>dark waves of men come sweeping out of the woods and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>down through the fields. He knew at once that the steel
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fibres had been washed from their hearts. They were burst
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing from their coats and their equipments as from en
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tangling things. They charged down upo<tei-restore change="dstX" hand="#SC" facs="#rboc-d_90_z015" data-origname="restore">n</tei-restore> him like ter
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rified buffalos.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Behind them, blue smoke curled and clouded,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and, through the thickets, he could sometimes <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z003" data-origname="add">see</tei-add><tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_90_z017" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> a dis
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tant, pink glare. The <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z004" data-origname="del">cannon's'</tei-del> voices of the cannon
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>were clamoring in an interminable chorus.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming was horror-stricken. He stared in pain
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and amazement. He forgot that nature had pointed
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>him out as a victim. He again lost all concern for
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>himself. He threw aside his mental pamphlets on the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>philosophy of the retreated and rules for the guid
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ance of the doomed.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The fight was lost. The foe was coming
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>storm-wise to flood the army.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Within him there was something that bade him
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>cry out. He had the impulse to make a rallying <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z005" data-origname="del">or</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>speech, to sing a battle-hymn, but he could only
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>get his tongue to call out into the air: "Why--why--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>what--what's th' matter?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Soon he was in the midst of them. They were
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>leaping and scampering all about him. Their blanched
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>faces shone in the dusk.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="13" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Within him there was something that bade him
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>cry out. He had the impulse to make a rallying <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z005" data-origname="del">or</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>speech, to sing a battle-hymn, but he could only
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>get his tongue to call out into the air: "Why--why--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>what--what's th' matter?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Soon he was in the midst of them. They were
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>leaping and scampering all about him. Their blanched
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>faces shone in the dusk.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="13" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_90" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="top" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="margin-top" function="foliation" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_90_z018" data-origname="metamark">90</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>XIII<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_90_z001" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z001" data-origname="del">sl</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z001" data-origname="add">co</tei-add></tei-subst>lumn that had butted stoutly at the obstacles in the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>roadway was barely out of Fleming's sight before he saw
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>dark waves of men come sweeping out of the woods and
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>down through the fields. He knew at once that the steel
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fibres had been washed from their hearts. They were burst
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ing from their coats and their equipments as from en
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tangling things. They charged down upo<tei-restore change="dstX" hand="#SC" facs="#rboc-d_90_z015" data-origname="restore">n</tei-restore> him like ter
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rified buffalos.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Behind them, blue smoke curled and clouded,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and, through the thickets, he could sometimes <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z003" data-origname="add">see</tei-add><tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dStA" facs="#rboc-d_90_z017" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> a dis
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>tant, pink glare. The <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z004" data-origname="del">cannon's'</tei-del> voices of the cannon
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>were clamoring in an interminable chorus.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming was horror-stricken. He stared in pain
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and amazement. He forgot that nature had pointed
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>him out as a victim. He again lost all concern for
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>himself. He threw aside his mental pamphlets on the
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>philosophy of the retreated and rules for the guid
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ance of the doomed.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The fight was lost. The foe was coming
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>storm-wise to flood the army.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Within him there was something that bade him
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>cry out. He had the impulse to make a rallying <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_90_z005" data-origname="del">or</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>speech, to sing a battle-hymn, but he could only
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>get his tongue to call out into the air: "Why--why--
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>what--what's th' matter?"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Soon he was in the midst of them. They were
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>leaping and scampering all about him. Their blanched
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>faces shone in the dusk.
</tei-ab><tei-milestone n="13" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_91" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab">91
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He turned from one to another as they galloped along<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z028" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="del">h</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="add">H</tei-add></tei-subst>is
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>half-coherent questions were lost. He made insane 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>appeals for information<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z029" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z004" data-origname="del">in</tei-del>The wild eyes seemed not 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to throw a glance in his direction.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Finally, he clutched a man by the arm. They 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>swayed around face to face.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stammered Fleming, struggling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with his balking tongue.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man screamed. "Let'go me! Let'go me!" 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z026" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z008" data-origname="add">face</tei-add> was livid and his eyes rolled as if he had lost control 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of them. He was puffing and panting. He still clutched 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his rifle perhaps <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z027" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z009" data-origname="add">having</tei-add> forgotten to <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z005" data-origname="del">lelax</tei-del>release his hold up-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on it. He tugged frantically and <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z025" data-origname="del">,</tei-del>Fleming, <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z013" data-origname="del">was</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z012" data-origname="add">being</tei-add> com-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pelled to lean forward, was dragged several paces.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Let'go me! Let'go me!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stuttered Fleming wildly.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Well, then," bawled the man in a lurid 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rage. He adroitly and fiercely swung his rifle. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It crushed upon Fleming's head. <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z016" data-origname="del">The latters fingers</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man ran on.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming's fingers had turned to paste upon 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the man's arm. He saw the burning wings of light-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ning flash before his eyes. There was a deafening
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rumble of thunder within his head.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Suddenly, his legs seemed to die. He fell 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>writhing to the ground. He tried to get up. In his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>efforts against <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z019" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>his pain he was like <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z021" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z020" data-origname="add">a man</tei-add> wrestling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with a creature of <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z022" data-origname="del">air</tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z023" data-origname="del">with a phantom</tei-del><tei-add place="below" rend="no-caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z024" data-origname="add">the atmosphere</tei-add>.</tei-ab>
<tei-milestone n="13" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_91" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab">91

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to throw a glance in his direction.

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man screamed. "Let'go me! Let'go me!"

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of them. He was puffing and panting. He still clutched 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his rifle perhaps <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z027" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z009" data-origname="add">having</tei-add> forgotten to <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z005" data-origname="del">lelax</tei-del>release his hold up-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on it. He tugged frantically and <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z025" data-origname="del">,</tei-del>Fleming, <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z013" data-origname="del">was</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z012" data-origname="add">being</tei-add> com-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pelled to lean forward, was dragged several paces.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Let'go me! Let'go me!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stuttered Fleming wildly.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Well, then," bawled the man in a lurid 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rage. He adroitly and fiercely swung his rifle. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It crushed upon Fleming's head. <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z016" data-origname="del">The latters fingers</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man ran on.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming's fingers had turned to paste upon 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the man's arm. He saw the burning wings of light-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ning flash before his eyes. There was a deafening

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Suddenly, his legs seemed to die. He fell 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>writhing to the ground. He tried to get up. In his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>efforts against <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z019" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>his pain he was like <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z021" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z020" data-origname="add">a man</tei-add> wrestling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with a creature of <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z022" data-origname="del">air</tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z023" data-origname="del">with a phantom</tei-del><tei-add place="below" rend="no-caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z024" data-origname="add">the atmosphere</tei-add>.</tei-ab>
<tei-milestone n="13" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z026" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z008" data-origname="add">face</tei-add> was livid and his eyes rolled as if he had lost control

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pelled to lean forward, was dragged several paces.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Let'go me! Let'go me!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stuttered Fleming wildly.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Well, then," bawled the man in a lurid 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rage. He adroitly and fiercely swung his rifle. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It crushed upon Fleming's head. <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z016" data-origname="del">The latters fingers</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man ran on.

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the man's arm. He saw the burning wings of light-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ning flash before his eyes. There was a deafening
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rumble of thunder within his head.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Suddenly, his legs seemed to die. He fell 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>writhing to the ground. He tried to get up. In his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>efforts against <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z019" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>his pain he was like <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z021" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z020" data-origname="add">a man</tei-add> wrestling

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_91" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab">91
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He turned from one to another as they galloped along<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z028" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="del">h</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="add">H</tei-add></tei-subst>is
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>half-coherent questions were lost. He made insane 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>appeals for information<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z029" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z004" data-origname="del">in</tei-del>The wild eyes seemed not 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to throw a glance in his direction.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Finally, he clutched a man by the arm. They 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>swayed around face to face.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stammered Fleming, struggling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with his balking tongue.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man screamed. "Let'go me! Let'go me!" 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z026" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z008" data-origname="add">face</tei-add> was livid and his eyes rolled as if he had lost control 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of them. He was puffing and panting. He still clutched 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his rifle perhaps <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z027" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z009" data-origname="add">having</tei-add> forgotten to <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z005" data-origname="del">lelax</tei-del>release his hold up-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on it. He tugged frantically and <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z025" data-origname="del">,</tei-del>Fleming, <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z013" data-origname="del">was</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z012" data-origname="add">being</tei-add> com-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pelled to lean forward, was dragged several paces.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Let'go me! Let'go me!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stuttered Fleming wildly.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Well, then," bawled the man in a lurid 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rage. He adroitly and fiercely swung his rifle. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It crushed upon Fleming's head. <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z016" data-origname="del">The latters fingers</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man ran on.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming's fingers had turned to paste upon 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the man's arm. He saw the burning wings of light-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ning flash before his eyes. There was a deafening
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rumble of thunder within his head.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Suddenly, his legs seemed to die. He fell 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>writhing to the ground. He tried to get up. In his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>efforts against <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z019" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>his pain he was like <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z021" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z020" data-origname="add">a man</tei-add> wrestling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with a creature of <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z022" data-origname="del">air</tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z023" data-origname="del">with a phantom</tei-del><tei-add place="below" rend="no-caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z024" data-origname="add">the atmosphere</tei-add>.</tei-ab>
<tei-milestone n="13" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Finally, he clutched a man by the arm. They 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>swayed around face to face.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stammered Fleming, struggling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with his balking tongue.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man screamed. "Let'go me! Let'go me!" 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z026" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z008" data-origname="add">face</tei-add> was livid and his eyes rolled as if he had lost control 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of them. He was puffing and panting. He still clutched 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his rifle perhaps <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z027" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z009" data-origname="add">having</tei-add> forgotten to <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z005" data-origname="del">lelax</tei-del>release his hold up-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on it. He tugged frantically and <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z025" data-origname="del">,</tei-del>Fleming, <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z013" data-origname="del">was</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z012" data-origname="add">being</tei-add> com-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pelled to lean forward, was dragged several paces.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Let'go me! Let'go me!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stuttered Fleming wildly.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Well, then," bawled the man in a lurid 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rage. He adroitly and fiercely swung his rifle. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It crushed upon Fleming's head. <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z016" data-origname="del">The latters fingers</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man ran on.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming's fingers had turned to paste upon 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the man's arm. He saw the burning wings of light-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ning flash before his eyes. There was a deafening
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rumble of thunder within his head.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Suddenly, his legs seemed to die. He fell 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>writhing to the ground. He tried to get up. In his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>efforts against <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z019" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>his pain he was like <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z021" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z020" data-origname="add">a man</tei-add> wrestling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with a creature of <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z022" data-origname="del">air</tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z023" data-origname="del">with a phantom</tei-del><tei-add place="below" rend="no-caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z024" data-origname="add">the atmosphere</tei-add>.</tei-ab>
<tei-milestone n="13" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Suddenly, his legs seemed to die. He fell 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>writhing to the ground. He tried to get up. In his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>efforts against <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z019" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>his pain he was like <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z021" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z020" data-origname="add">a man</tei-add> wrestling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with a creature of <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z022" data-origname="del">air</tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z023" data-origname="del">with a phantom</tei-del><tei-add place="below" rend="no-caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z024" data-origname="add">the atmosphere</tei-add>.</tei-ab>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_91" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab">91
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He turned from one to another as they galloped along<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z028" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="del">h</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="add">H</tei-add></tei-subst>is
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>half-coherent questions were lost. He made insane 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>appeals for information<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z029" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z004" data-origname="del">in</tei-del>The wild eyes seemed not 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to throw a glance in his direction.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Finally, he clutched a man by the arm. They 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>swayed around face to face.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stammered Fleming, struggling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with his balking tongue.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man screamed. "Let'go me! Let'go me!" 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z026" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z008" data-origname="add">face</tei-add> was livid and his eyes rolled as if he had lost control 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of them. He was puffing and panting. He still clutched 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his rifle perhaps <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z027" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z009" data-origname="add">having</tei-add> forgotten to <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z005" data-origname="del">lelax</tei-del>release his hold up-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on it. He tugged frantically and <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z025" data-origname="del">,</tei-del>Fleming, <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z013" data-origname="del">was</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z012" data-origname="add">being</tei-add> com-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pelled to lean forward, was dragged several paces.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Let'go me! Let'go me!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stuttered Fleming wildly.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Well, then," bawled the man in a lurid 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rage. He adroitly and fiercely swung his rifle. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It crushed upon Fleming's head. <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z016" data-origname="del">The latters fingers</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man ran on.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming's fingers had turned to paste upon 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the man's arm. He saw the burning wings of light-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ning flash before his eyes. There was a deafening
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rumble of thunder within his head.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Suddenly, his legs seemed to die. He fell 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>writhing to the ground. He tried to get up. In his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>efforts against <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z019" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>his pain he was like <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z021" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z020" data-origname="add">a man</tei-add> wrestling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with a creature of <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z022" data-origname="del">air</tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z023" data-origname="del">with a phantom</tei-del><tei-add place="below" rend="no-caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z024" data-origname="add">the atmosphere</tei-add>.</tei-ab>
<tei-milestone n="13" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on it.   <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pelled to lean forward, was dragged several paces.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Let'go me! Let'go me!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stuttered Fleming wildly.

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rage. He adroitly and fiercely swung his rifle.

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on it.   <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rage. He adroitly and fiercely swung his rifle. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It crushed upon Fleming's head. <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z016" data-origname="del">The latters fingers</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man ran on.

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>writhing to the ground. He tried to get up. In his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>efforts against <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z019" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>his pain he was like <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z021" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z020" data-origname="add">a man</tei-add> wrestling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with a creature of <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z022" data-origname="del">air</tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z023" data-origname="del">with a phantom</tei-del><tei-add place="below" rend="no-caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z024" data-origname="add">the atmosphere</tei-add>.</tei-ab>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with a creature of <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z022" data-origname="del">air</tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z023" data-origname="del">with a phantom</tei-del><tei-add place="below" rend="no-caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z024" data-origname="add">the atmosphere</tei-add>.</tei-ab>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_91" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab">91
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He turned from one to another as they galloped along<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z028" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="del">h</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="add">H</tei-add></tei-subst>is
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>half-coherent questions were lost. He made insane 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>appeals for information<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z029" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z004" data-origname="del">in</tei-del>The wild eyes seemed not 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to throw a glance in his direction.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Finally, he clutched a man by the arm. They 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>swayed around face to face.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stammered Fleming, struggling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with his balking tongue.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man screamed. "Let'go me! Let'go me!" 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z026" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z008" data-origname="add">face</tei-add> was livid and his eyes rolled as if he had lost control 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of them. He was puffing and panting. He still clutched 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his rifle perhaps <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z027" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z009" data-origname="add">having</tei-add> forgotten to <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z005" data-origname="del">lelax</tei-del>release his hold up-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on it. He tugged frantically and <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z025" data-origname="del">,</tei-del>Fleming, <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z013" data-origname="del">was</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z012" data-origname="add">being</tei-add> com-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pelled to lean forward, was dragged several paces.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Let'go me! Let'go me!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stuttered Fleming wildly.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Well, then," bawled the man in a lurid 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rage. He adroitly and fiercely swung his rifle. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It crushed upon Fleming's head. <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z016" data-origname="del">The latters fingers</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man ran on.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming's fingers had turned to paste upon 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the man's arm. He saw the burning wings of light-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ning flash before his eyes. There was a deafening
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rumble of thunder within his head.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Suddenly, his legs seemed to die. He fell 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>writhing to the ground. He tried to get up. In his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>efforts against <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z019" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>his pain he was like <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z021" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z020" data-origname="add">a man</tei-add> wrestling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with a creature of <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z022" data-origname="del">air</tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z023" data-origname="del">with a phantom</tei-del><tei-add place="below" rend="no-caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z024" data-origname="add">the atmosphere</tei-add>.</tei-ab>
<tei-milestone n="13" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>
