  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his rifle perhaps <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z027" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z009" data-origname="add">having</tei-add> forgotten to <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z005" data-origname="del">lelax</tei-del>release his hold up-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on it. He tugged frantically and <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z025" data-origname="del">,</tei-del>Fleming, <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z013" data-origname="del">was</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z012" data-origname="add">being</tei-add> com-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pelled to lean forward, was dragged several paces.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Let'go me! Let'go me!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stuttered Fleming wildly.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Well, then," bawled the man in a lurid 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rage. He adroitly and fiercely swung his rifle. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It crushed upon Fleming's head. <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z016" data-origname="del">The latters fingers</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man ran on.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming's fingers had turned to paste upon 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the man's arm. He saw the burning wings of light-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ning flash before his eyes. There was a deafening
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rumble of thunder within his head.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Suddenly, his legs seemed to die. He fell 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>writhing to the ground. He tried to get up. In his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>efforts against <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z019" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>his pain he was like <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z021" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z020" data-origname="add">a man</tei-add> wrestling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with a creature of <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z022" data-origname="del">air</tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z023" data-origname="del">with a phantom</tei-del><tei-add place="below" rend="no-caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z024" data-origname="add">the atmosphere</tei-add>.</tei-ab>
<tei-milestone n="13" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_91" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab data-origname="ab">91
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He turned from one to another as they galloped along<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z028" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-subst facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="subst"><tei-del rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="del">h</tei-del><tei-add place="inline" rend="ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z003" data-origname="add">H</tei-add></tei-subst>is
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>half-coherent questions were lost. He made insane 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>appeals for information<tei-add place="inline" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z029" data-origname="add">.</tei-add> <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z004" data-origname="del">in</tei-del>The wild eyes seemed not 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to throw a glance in his direction.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Finally, he clutched a man by the arm. They 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>swayed around face to face.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stammered Fleming, struggling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with his balking tongue.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man screamed. "Let'go me! Let'go me!" 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>His <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z026" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z008" data-origname="add">face</tei-add> was livid and his eyes rolled as if he had lost control 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>of them. He was puffing and panting. He still clutched 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his rifle perhaps <tei-metamark place="inline" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z027" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark> <tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z009" data-origname="add">having</tei-add> forgotten to <tei-del rend="doublestrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z005" data-origname="del">lelax</tei-del>release his hold up-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>on it. He tugged frantically and <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z025" data-origname="del">,</tei-del>Fleming, <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z013" data-origname="del">was</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z012" data-origname="add">being</tei-add> com-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pelled to lean forward, was dragged several paces.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Let'go me! Let'go me!"
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Why--why--" stuttered Fleming wildly.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>"Well, then," bawled the man in a lurid 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rage. He adroitly and fiercely swung his rifle. 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>It crushed upon Fleming's head. <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z016" data-origname="del">The latters fingers</tei-del>
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The man ran on.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Fleming's fingers had turned to paste upon 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the man's arm. He saw the burning wings of light-
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>ning flash before his eyes. There was a deafening
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>rumble of thunder within his head.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Suddenly, his legs seemed to die. He fell 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>writhing to the ground. He tried to get up. In his 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>efforts against <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z019" data-origname="del">the</tei-del>his pain he was like <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z021" data-origname="del">a</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z020" data-origname="add">a man</tei-add> wrestling 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with a creature of <tei-del rend="multistrikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z022" data-origname="del">air</tei-del><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z023" data-origname="del">with a phantom</tei-del><tei-add place="below" rend="no-caret pencil" hand="#SC" change="dstX" facs="#rboc-d_91_z024" data-origname="add">the atmosphere</tei-add>.</tei-ab>
<tei-milestone n="13" unit="chapter" data-origname="milestone" data-empty=""></tei-milestone></tei-div></tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_92" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z021" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was a sinister struggle. Sometimes, he would
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z018" data-origname="del">ac</tei-del>achieve a position half-erect, battle with the air for 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a moment, and then fall again. His face was of a 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>clammy pallor. Deep groans were wrenched from him.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>At last with a twisting movement he got upon
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands and knees <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z019" data-origname="del">afrom</tei-del>and from thence, like a 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z016" data-origname="del">childlearning</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z017" data-origname="add">babe trying</tei-add> to walk, upon his feet. He went lurch
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ing over the grass.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And afterward, Fleming fought an intense 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fight with his body. His dulled senses wished him 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to swoon and he opposed them stubbornly, his mind 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>picturing unknown dangers and mutilations if he 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fell upon the field. He went forward, Conklin-fash
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ion.He thought of secluded spots where he could 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fall and be unmolested. To reach <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z015" data-origname="del">them</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z014" data-origname="add">one</tei-add>, he strove
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>against the tide of his pain.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He put his hand up to his head and timidly
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>touched the wound under his hair. The scratching
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pain of the contact made him draw a long breath 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>through his clenched teeth. His fingers were dabbled 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with blood. He regarded them with a fixed stare.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Around him, he could hear the grumble of jolt
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ing batteries as the <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z010" data-origname="del">rumming</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z011" data-origname="add">scurrying</tei-add> horses were lashed toward  
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the front. Once a young officer on a be-splashed 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>charger near ran him down. He turned and watched 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the artilleryman controlling the mass of cannon, men,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and horses by excited motions of his gauntleted hand.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The guns followed the teams with <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z012" data-origname="del">and</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z013" data-origname="add">a seeming</tei-add> air of 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z009" data-origname="del">being</tei-del>unwillingness. 
</tei-ab>
</tei-div>
</tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_92" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z021" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was a sinister struggle. He went lurch
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ing over the grass.

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fight with his body. His dulled senses wished him 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to swoon and he opposed them stubbornly, his mind 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>picturing unknown dangers and mutilations if he 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fell upon the field. He went forward, Conklin-fash
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ion.He thought of secluded spots where he could 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fall and be unmolested. To reach <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z015" data-origname="del">them</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z014" data-origname="add">one</tei-add>, he strove
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>against the tide of his pain.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He put his hand up to his head and timidly
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>touched the wound under his hair. The scratching
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pain of the contact made him draw a long breath 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>through his clenched teeth. His fingers were dabbled 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with blood. He regarded them with a fixed stare.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Around him, he could hear the grumble of jolt
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ing batteries as the <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z010" data-origname="del">rumming</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z011" data-origname="add">scurrying</tei-add> horses were lashed toward  
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the front. Once a young officer on a be-splashed 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>charger near ran him down. He turned and watched 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the artilleryman controlling the mass of cannon, men,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and horses by excited motions of his gauntleted hand.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The guns followed the teams with <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z012" data-origname="del">and</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z013" data-origname="add">a seeming</tei-add> air of 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z009" data-origname="del">being</tei-del>unwillingness. 
</tei-ab>
</tei-div>
</tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_92" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z021" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was a sinister struggle. Sometimes, he would
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z018" data-origname="del">ac</tei-del>achieve a position half-erect, battle with the air for 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a moment, and then fall again. His face was of a 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>clammy pallor. Deep groans were wrenched from him.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>At last with a twisting movement he got upon
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands and knees <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z019" data-origname="del">afrom</tei-del>and from thence, like a 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z016" data-origname="del">childlearning</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z017" data-origname="add">babe trying</tei-add> to walk, upon his feet. He went lurch
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ing over the grass.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And afterward, Fleming fought an intense 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fight with his body. His dulled senses wished him 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to swoon and he opposed them stubbornly, his mind 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>picturing unknown dangers and mutilations if he 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fell upon the field. He went forward, Conklin-fash
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ion.He thought of secluded spots where he could 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fall and be unmolested. To reach <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z015" data-origname="del">them</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z014" data-origname="add">one</tei-add>, he strove
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>against the tide of his pain.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He put his hand up to his head and timidly
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>touched the wound under his hair. The scratching
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pain of the contact made him draw a long breath 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>through his clenched teeth. His fingers were dabbled 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with blood. He regarded them with a fixed stare.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Around him, he could hear the grumble of jolt
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ing batteries as the <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z010" data-origname="del">rumming</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z011" data-origname="add">scurrying</tei-add> horses were lashed toward  
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the front. Once a young officer on a be-splashed 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>charger near ran him down. He turned and watched 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the artilleryman controlling the mass of cannon, men,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and horses by excited motions of his gauntleted hand.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The guns followed the teams with <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z012" data-origname="del">and</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z013" data-origname="add">a seeming</tei-add> air of 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z009" data-origname="del">being</tei-del>unwillingness. 
</tei-ab>
</tei-div>

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Around him, he could hear the grumble of jolt
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ing batteries as the <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z010" data-origname="del">rumming</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z011" data-origname="add">scurrying</tei-add> horses were lashed toward  
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the front. Once a young officer on a be-splashed 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>charger near ran him down. He turned and watched 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the artilleryman controlling the mass of cannon, men,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and horses by excited motions of his gauntleted hand.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The guns followed the teams with <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z012" data-origname="del">and</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z013" data-origname="add">a seeming</tei-add> air of

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_92" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z021" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was a sinister struggle.   <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z018" data-origname="del">ac</tei-del>achieve a position half-erect, battle with the air for 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a moment, and then fall again. His face was of a 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>clammy pallor. Deep groans were wrenched from him.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>At last with a twisting movement he got upon
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands and knees <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z019" data-origname="del">afrom</tei-del>and from thence, like a 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z016" data-origname="del">childlearning</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z017" data-origname="add">babe trying</tei-add> to walk, upon his feet. He went lurch
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ing over the grass.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And afterward, Fleming fought an intense 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fight with his body. His dulled senses wished him 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to swoon and he opposed them stubbornly, his mind 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>picturing unknown dangers and mutilations if he 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fell upon the field. He went forward, Conklin-fash
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ion.He thought of secluded spots where he could 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fall and be unmolested.   <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>against the tide of his pain.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He put his hand up to his head and timidly
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>touched the wound under his hair. The scratching
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pain of the contact made him draw a long breath 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>through his clenched teeth. His fingers were dabbled 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with blood. He regarded them with a fixed stare.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Around him, he could hear the grumble of jolt
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ing batteries as the <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z010" data-origname="del">rumming</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z011" data-origname="add">scurrying</tei-add> horses were lashed toward

  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>charger near ran him down. He turned and watched 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the artilleryman controlling the mass of cannon, men,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and horses by excited motions of his gauntleted hand.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The guns followed the teams with <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z012" data-origname="del">and</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z013" data-origname="add">a seeming</tei-add> air of 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z009" data-origname="del">being</tei-del>unwillingness. 
</tei-ab>
</tei-div>
</tei-body></tei-text>

<tei-text data-xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" data-origname="text"><tei-body data-origname="body"><tei-div data-origname="div"><tei-pb facs="#rboc-d_92" data-origname="pb" data-empty=""></tei-pb><tei-ab rend="bottom" data-origname="ab"><tei-metamark place="below" function="caret" rend="ink" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z021" data-origname="metamark">^</tei-metamark></tei-ab><tei-ab data-origname="ab"><tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>There was a sinister struggle. Sometimes, he would
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z018" data-origname="del">ac</tei-del>achieve a position half-erect, battle with the air for 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>a moment, and then fall again. His face was of a 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>clammy pallor. Deep groans were wrenched from him.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>At last with a twisting movement he got upon
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>his hands and knees <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z019" data-origname="del">afrom</tei-del>and from thence, like a 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z016" data-origname="del">childlearning</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z017" data-origname="add">babe trying</tei-add> to walk, upon his feet. He went lurch
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ing over the grass.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>And afterward, Fleming fought an intense 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fight with his body. His dulled senses wished him 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>to swoon and he opposed them stubbornly, his mind 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>picturing unknown dangers and mutilations if he 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fell upon the field. He went forward, Conklin-fash
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ion.He thought of secluded spots where he could 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>fall and be unmolested. To reach <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z015" data-origname="del">them</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z014" data-origname="add">one</tei-add>, he strove
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>against the tide of his pain.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>He put his hand up to his head and timidly
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>touched the wound under his hair. The scratching
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>pain of the contact made him draw a long breath 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>through his clenched teeth. His fingers were dabbled 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>with blood. He regarded them with a fixed stare.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>Around him, he could hear the grumble of jolt
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>-ing batteries as the <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z010" data-origname="del">rumming</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="no-caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z011" data-origname="add">scurrying</tei-add> horses were lashed toward  
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the front. Once a young officer on a be-splashed 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>charger near ran him down. He turned and watched 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>the artilleryman controlling the mass of cannon, men,
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>and horses by excited motions of his gauntleted hand.
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb>The guns followed the teams with <tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z012" data-origname="del">and</tei-del><tei-add place="above" rend="caret ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z013" data-origname="add">a seeming</tei-add> air of 
  <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""></tei-lb><tei-del rend="strikethrough ink" hand="#SC" change="dStB" facs="#rboc-d_92_z009" data-origname="del">being</tei-del>unwillingness. 
</tei-ab>
</tei-div>
</tei-body></tei-text>
